programme.title: The Stream
programme.desc: The Stream taps into the extraordinary potential of social media to disseminate news. programme.title: Expedition Bigfoot
programme.desc: Russell tallentaa lampokuvia, joiden han uskoo olevan isojalka. Mireya ja Ronny kokevat kauhun hetkia tajutessaan, etteivat he ole metsassa yksin.

programme.title: Shark Week Immersion
programme.desc: Syvyystiimi vastaa haikaloja koskeviin kysymyksiin laidasta laitaan. Popkulttuurin historiasta nostetaan esiin kuuluisia haikohtauksia ja niita kokeillaan tosielamassa.

programme.title: The Zoo
programme.desc: Gorillaperhe muuttaa vihdoin uuteen kotiinsa sademetsaan, mutta onko se mieleinen? Mangabi-poikanen tutustuu laumansa. Maatilalla otetaan vastaan vastasyntyneita karitsoja.

programme.title: Meet The Penguins
programme.desc: Kapkaupungin Sanccob Seabird -pelastuskeskuksessa yritetaan pelastaa pingviini oljyvauriolta. Isaksi haluavan Winstonin pesanrakennuspuuhat menevat liian pitkalle!

programme.title: Meet The Penguins
programme.desc: Keskuksen akaisin asukas Crabby tervehtii uutta asiakasta, joka sulattaa hanen sydamensa. Princess-pingviini kokee nuoren elamansa suurimman menetyksen.

programme.title: Dodo Heroes
programme.desc: Kausi 2 osa 4/6. Koskettavassa sarjassa ihmiset tekevat kaikkensa, jotta pystyat auttamaan apua tarvitsevia elaimia ympari maailmaa. (Dodo Heroes, tosi-tv, USA, 2019)

programme.title: Elainsuojat kuntoon
programme.desc: Vapaaehtoisten yllapitama elainpelastuskeskus Virginiassa kokee muodonmuutoksen, kun Project Pawsitive remontoi sen uuteen uskoon.

programme.title: Erakkoperhe eramaassa
programme.desc: Alaskan eramaassa asuu villina syntynyt ja kasvanut perhe. Billy ja Amy Brown seka heidan seitseman lastaan elavat omavaraistaloudessa, missa parjaaminen riippuu yhteistyosta.

programme.title: Erakkoperhe eramaassa
programme.desc: Alaskan eramaassa elaa seitsenlapsinen Brownin perhe. He asuvat yhteiskunnan ulkopuolella ilman mukavuuksia, ja luonnon armoilla he ovat taysin riippuvaisia toisistaan.

programme.title: Ihmeelliset elaimet
programme.desc: Tutkijat testaavat mielenkiintoisella kokeella ovatko villisudet lemmikkikoiria alykkaampia. Osaavatko hamahakit lentaa? Miten jaakarhut pysyvat lampimana?

programme.title: Ihmeelliset elaimet
programme.desc: Tutkijat selvittavat, miksi hukutetut muurahaiset eivat huku. Miksi tikka ei saa paansarkya? Miten viisimetrinen mustekala pakenee 7,5 senttimetrin reiasta?

programme.title: Animal Cops Miami
programme.desc: Manaatin pelastus. Manaatin rapylan dramaattinen pelastus paljastaa salaisuuden. Tutkija Casadevall etsii salametsastajia, joiden hyokkayksissa on kuollut useita karjaelaimia.

programme.title: Animal Cops Miami
programme.desc: Kamppailu elamasta. Elainjulmuuksien tutkijat pyrkivat saamaan oikeutta laiminlyodylle koiralle ja sen pennulle, ja tutkija Casadevall rientaa auttamaan Miamin kuumuudessa karsivia koiria.

programme.title: Houstonin elainpoliisit
programme.desc: Dokumentaarisessa sarjassa seurataan Houstonin elainsuojeluyhdistyksen tyota kaltoinkohdeltujen elainten hyvaksi.

programme.title: Matkalla elainlaakariksi
programme.desc: Sarjassa seurataan kuuden elainlaakariopiskelijan elamaa ja opintoja heidan viimeisena opiskeluvuotenaan. Tulevien elainlaakareiden hoivissa apua saavat kaikenkarvaiset elaimet koosta riippumatta. (Life at Vet U, tosi-tv, USA, 2016)

programme.title: Hurjimmat minielaimet
programme.desc: Tiimi etsii Mosambikista hengenvaarallista "paholaisenkukan" rukoilijasirkkaa. Terien ja koukkujen peittama hyonteinen on lahes huomaamaton, silla se nayttaa trooppiselta kukalta.

programme.title: Hurjimmat minielaimet
programme.desc: Kausi 1, jakso 12. Maailman syrjaisimmista kolkista loytyy pienenpienia elaimia, jotka herattavat suurta kunnioitusta. Nama liskot ja otokat ovat monstereita, jotka hallitsevat elinymparistoaan miltei yliluonnllisilla kyvyillaan: ne voivat esimerkiksi muuttaa muotoaan ja ampua myrkyllista verta silmistaan. (Little Giants, dokumenttisarja, USA, 2019)

programme.title: Kalliovuorten elainlaakari
programme.desc: Elainlaakari Jeff on hylattyna ja jalka poikki loytyneen koiranpennun ainoa toivo. Vastaanotolla hoidetaan bostoninterrieria, jolla on vakavan sairauden oireita.

programme.title: Kalliovuorten elainlaakari
programme.desc: Nuoren miehen lemmikkivuohi on loukkaantunut onnettomuudessa. Gus-koira on nielaissut tuntemattoman esineen ja on ollut siita lahtien huonovointinen.

programme.title: Crikey! Its the Irwins
programme.desc: Kausi 1 osa 1/14. Krokotiilimiehena tunnetuksi tulleen Steve Irwinin perinto elaa hanen leskessaan Terrissa seka lapsissaan Bindissa ja Robertissa. Intohimoisina luonnonsuojelijoina he pyorittavat aivan erityislaatuista Australian elaintarhaa, jossa toimii myos huipputason villielainsairaala. (Crikey! Its The Irwins, tosi-tv, USA, 2018)

programme.title: Crikey! Its the Irwins
programme.desc: Kausi 1 osa 2/14. Krokotiilimiehena tunnetuksi tulleen Steve Irwinin perinto elaa hanen leskessaan Terrissa seka lapsissaan Bindissa ja Robertissa. Intohimoisina luonnonsuojelijoina he pyorittavat aivan erityislaatuista Australian elaintarhaa, jossa toimii myos huipputason villielainsairaala. (Crikey! Its The Irwins, tosi-tv, USA, 2018)

programme.title: Tummien vesien mysteerit
programme.desc: Kalastaja ja tutkimusretkeilija Jeremy Wade on ammattikalastajien aluksella Alaskassa etsimassa ruijanpallasta. Nakyyko 25-kiloisesta jatista jalkeakaan?

programme.title: Ehdonalaisvangit koirankouluttajina
programme.desc: Lizzy yrittaa loytaa pelastuskeskuksen pihalle sidotun koiran omistajan. Vanhempi pariskunta saapuu katselemaan ensimmaista koiraansa.

programme.title: Kissakuiskaaja
programme.desc: Jackson auttaa traumaperaisesta stressihairiosta karsivaa sotaveteraania, joka on alkanut ahdistua terapiakissastaan. Bartholomew repii hajalle paitsi huonekalut, myos avioliiton.

programme.title: Koteja lemmikkiperheille
programme.desc: Suunnittelija Antonio Ballatore rakastaa elaimia. Hanen intohimonaan on yhdessa tiiminsa kanssa kunnostaa ransistyneita ja ahtaita koteja seka niiden pihoja uuteen, elain- ja ihmisystavallisempaan kuosiin.

programme.title: Akvaariomestarit
programme.desc: Kausi 6, osa 1. Parhaat ystavat ja kilpakumppanit Wayde King ja Brett Raymer luotsaavat menestyksekasta Acrylic Tank Manufacturing -perheyritysta, jonka osaava tiimi toteuttaa akvaarioharrastajien villeimmatkin unelmat. Tiimin kasissa merenalainen maailma syntyy niin baaritiskin yhteyteen kuin pyramidin muotoon. (Tanked, tosi-tv, USA, 2016)

programme.title: Harvinaisten elainten jaljilla
programme.desc: Forrest sukeltaa Indonesian Jaavalle etsimaan jaavantiikeria. Laji julistettiin sukupuuttoon kuolleeksi vuonna 2003, mutta siita on ilmoitettu hiljattain uusia nakohavaintoja.

programme.title: Akvaariomestarit
programme.desc: Kausi 6, osa 9. Parhaat ystavat ja kilpakumppanit Wayde King ja Brett Raymer luotsaavat menestyksekasta Acrylic Tank Manufacturing -perheyritysta, jonka osaava tiimi toteuttaa akvaarioharrastajien villeimmatkin unelmat. Tiimin kasissa merenalainen maailma syntyy niin baaritiskin yhteyteen kuin pyramidin muotoon. (Tanked, tosi-tv, USA, 2016)

programme.title: Akvaariomestarit
programme.desc: Kalliin hintaluokan kustomoituja autoja ja harvinaisia malleja suunnitteleva yritys tilaa eksoottisen akvaarion. Valtavasta kolmitahoisesta akvaariosta tulee sen keskipiste!

programme.title: Akvaariomestarit
programme.desc: NASCAR-kuljettaja Kurt Busch ja hanen vaimonsa haluavat akvaarioonsa pikku paratiisin. He tilaavat pienoismallin haapaikastaan!

programme.title: Alaska: Surviving the Last Frontier
programme.desc: Vapaaehtoiset joutuvat lumimyrskyyn, hyisiin jokiin ja koviin pakkasiin. Heista tuntuu, etta peli on menetetty, mutta takaisinkaan ei voi enaa kaantya.

programme.title: Animal ER
programme.desc: Murphy-koiranpentu syo palan koria, ja kun se poistetaan leikkauksella, loytyy vatsasta epanormaali verisuoni. Kirurgi Kathryn kauhistuu sen kokoa, pystyyko han parantamaan sen?

programme.title: The Zoo
programme.desc: Kun mangabi-apinaemo hylkaa poikasensa, pystyyko tiimi kasvattamaan sen? Ciaran valmistaa gorilloja uutta sademetsaa varten, ja tarantellat herkuttelevat sirkoilla.

programme.title: Alaskan erakot
programme.desc: Talven tuloon on enaa viikkoja, ja perheet yrittavat tayttaa ruokavarastojaan. Heimo ja Charlie pelkaavat, ettei heilla ole tarpeeksi lihaa talveksi.

programme.title: Harvinaisten elainten jaljilla
programme.desc: Forrest sukeltaa Indonesian Jaavalle etsimaan jaavantiikeria. Laji julistettiin sukupuuttoon kuolleeksi vuonna 2003, mutta siita on ilmoitettu hiljattain uusia nakohavaintoja.

programme.title: Ihanat kamalat lemmikit
programme.desc: Koira kaivaa ojia takapihalle ja sen omistajat tayttavat ne puskutraktorilla. Myohemmin vuohet ryntailevat synttarijuhlissa ja koira varastaa omistajansa alusvaatteita.

programme.title: Erakkoperhe eramaassa
programme.desc: Syvalla Alaskan eramaassa asuu villina syntynyt ja kasvanut perhe. Billy ja Amy Brown ja heidan seitseman lastaan elavat omavaraistilalla, missa toimeentulo riippuu yhteistyosta.

programme.title: Erakkoperhe eramaassa
programme.desc: Brownit lisaavat puolustusvalmiuttaan loydettyaan vaarallisen saalistajan maatilansa laheisyydesta.

programme.title: Fish Or Die
programme.desc: Kausi 1 osa 7/10. Nelja raskaan sarjan kalamiesta ja ystavysta yhdistaa sarjassa voimansa, silla he haluavat olla ensimmaisina kalassa maailman syrjaisimmilla vesilla. Vaikka henki menisi. Paastakseen katkettyjen, mystisten vesien ja niissa piileskelevien tarunhohtoisten kalojen luo Chris, Thad, Brian ja Jay joutuvat mm. istumaan ratissa ajotunteja laskematta, taittamaan taivalta kiikkeralla lautalla ja raivaamaan tietaan kesyttomassa viidakossa. (Fish or Die, tosi-tv, USA, 2019)

programme.title: Crikey! Its the Irwins
programme.desc: Kausi 1 osa 1/14. Krokotiilimiehena tunnetuksi tulleen Steve Irwinin perinto elaa hanen leskessaan Terrissa seka lapsissaan Bindissa ja Robertissa. Intohimoisina luonnonsuojelijoina he pyorittavat aivan erityislaatuista Australian elaintarhaa, jossa toimii myos huipputason villielainsairaala. (Crikey! Its The Irwins, tosi-tv, USA, 2018)

programme.title: The Zoo
programme.desc: New Yorkin Bronxissa sijaitsevassa elaintarhassa asuu yli 6000 elainta, joiden hyvinvoinnista vastaa 500 asialleen omistautunutta tyontekijaa. Sarja vie elaintarhan kiehtoviin kulisseihin, joissa jokainen paiva on taynna yllatyksia.

programme.title: The Zoo
programme.desc: Gorillaperhe muuttaa vihdoin uuteen kotiinsa sademetsaan, mutta onko se mieleinen? Mangabi-poikanen tutustuu laumansa. Maatilalla otetaan vastaan vastasyntyneita karitsoja.

programme.title: Kalliovuorten elainlaakari
programme.desc: Elainlaakari Jeff on hylattyna ja jalka poikki loytyneen koiranpennun ainoa toivo. Vastaanotolla hoidetaan bostoninterrieria, jolla on vakavan sairauden oireita.

programme.title: Akvaariomestarit
programme.desc: Kalliin hintaluokan kustomoituja autoja ja harvinaisia malleja suunnitteleva yritys tilaa eksoottisen akvaarion. Valtavasta kolmitahoisesta akvaariosta tulee sen keskipiste!

programme.title: Vet Life: Bonus Tails
programme.desc: Bassetilla on perussairaus, joka saattaa hankaloittaa elainlaakari Rossin tekemaa leikkausta. Elainlaakari Lavigne ei halua teknikkoa avukseen oman koiransa leikkaukseen.

programme.title: Vet Life: Bonus Tails
programme.desc: Yuki-bulldoggi on syonyt jotain sopimatonta, ja elainlaakari Blue yrittaa loytaa sen. Elainlaakari Lavignen adoptoima kissa tarvitsee kaksoisamputaation jalkeista hoitoa.

programme.title: Louisiana Law
programme.desc: Kadonnutta kalastajaa etsitaan pelastuspartion avulla. Poliisit kuulustelevat uusintarikollista metsastajien hairinnasta, ja rikollinen jaa kiinni laittoman tuliaseen kanssa.

programme.title: Fish Or Die
programme.desc: Kausi 1 osa 7/10. Nelja raskaan sarjan kalamiesta ja ystavysta yhdistaa sarjassa voimansa, silla he haluavat olla ensimmaisina kalassa maailman syrjaisimmilla vesilla. Vaikka henki menisi. Paastakseen katkettyjen, mystisten vesien ja niissa piileskelevien tarunhohtoisten kalojen luo Chris, Thad, Brian ja Jay joutuvat mm. istumaan ratissa ajotunteja laskematta, taittamaan taivalta kiikkeralla lautalla ja raivaamaan tietaan kesyttomassa viidakossa. (Fish or Die, tosi-tv, USA, 2019)

programme.title: Uskomattomat puumajat
programme.desc: Puumajarakentamisen erikoisosaaja Pete Nelson kay lapi kaudella aikaisemmin nayttamatonta kuvamateriaalia, muistelee hurjia tilanteita ja epaortodoksisia rakennustekniikoita.

programme.title: Ehdonalaisvangit koirankouluttajina
programme.desc: Kausi 10, osa 19. Tia Torres kuntouttaa kaltoinkohdeltuja amerikanpitbullterriereita ehdonalaisvankien avulla Villalobosin pelastuskeskuksessa. Tekemista riittaa, kun tyontekijoiden pyrkimyksena on myos muuttaa ihmisten asenteita kiisteltya ja pelattya koirarotua kohtaan. (Pit Bulls and Parolees, tosi-tv, USA, 2018)

programme.title: Kissakuiskaaja
programme.desc: Jackson miettii miten hillita ahdistuneen kissan holtitonta virtsailua. Miten huonoa omaatuntoa poteva omistaja saadaan lopettamaan lasagnen syottaminen diabeetikkokissalleen?

programme.title: Crikey! Its the Irwins
programme.desc: Kausi 1 osa 1/14. Krokotiilimiehena tunnetuksi tulleen Steve Irwinin perinto elaa hanen leskessaan Terrissa seka lapsissaan Bindissa ja Robertissa. Intohimoisina luonnonsuojelijoina he pyorittavat aivan erityislaatuista Australian elaintarhaa, jossa toimii myos huipputason villielainsairaala. (Crikey! Its The Irwins, tosi-tv, USA, 2018)

programme.title: Kalliovuorten elainlaakari
programme.desc: Elainlaakari Jeff on hylattyna ja jalka poikki loytyneen koiranpennun ainoa toivo. Vastaanotolla hoidetaan bostoninterrieria, jolla on vakavan sairauden oireita.

programme.title: Koteja lemmikkiperheille
programme.desc: Suunnittelija Antonio Ballatore rakastaa elaimia. Hanen intohimonaan on yhdessa tiiminsa kanssa kunnostaa ransistyneita ja ahtaita koteja seka niiden pihoja uuteen, elain- ja ihmisystavallisempaan kuosiin.

programme.title: Expedition Bigfoot
programme.desc: Russell tallentaa lampokuvia, joiden han uskoo olevan isojalka. Mireya ja Ronny kokevat kauhun hetkia tajutessaan, etteivat he ole metsassa yksin.

programme.title: Erakkoperhe eramaassa
programme.desc: Syvalla Alaskan eramaassa asuu villina syntynyt ja kasvanut perhe. Billy ja Amy Brown ja heidan seitseman lastaan elavat omavaraistilalla, missa toimeentulo riippuu yhteistyosta.

programme.title: Louisiana Law
programme.desc: Kadonnutta kalastajaa etsitaan pelastuspartion avulla. Poliisit kuulustelevat uusintarikollista metsastajien hairinnasta, ja rikollinen jaa kiinni laittoman tuliaseen kanssa.

programme.title: Cats of Claw Hill
programme.desc: Animal Planetin uusi saippuadokumenttisarja valottaa kotikissojen yksityista maailmaa kiehtovasti seuraten kissojen arkielamaa "kissaperspektiivista".

programme.title: Cats of Claw Hill
programme.desc: Animal Planetin uusi saippuadokumenttisarja valottaa kotikissojen yksityista maailmaa kiehtovasti seuraten kissojen arkielamaa "kissaperspektiivista".

programme.title: Harvinaisten elainten jaljilla
programme.desc: Forrest sukeltaa Indonesian Jaavalle etsimaan jaavantiikeria. Laji julistettiin sukupuuttoon kuolleeksi vuonna 2003, mutta siita on ilmoitettu hiljattain uusia nakohavaintoja.

programme.title: Hirvio sisallani
programme.desc: Laakarit huomaavat jouluvauvan synnyttya, etta se on saanut kohdussa aivotulehduksen. Nainen luulee, etta hanen silmassaan on mato. Mies saa ilkean yllatyksen leikkauksen jalkeen.

programme.title: Akvaariomestarit
programme.desc: Kalliin hintaluokan kustomoituja autoja ja harvinaisia malleja suunnitteleva yritys tilaa eksoottisen akvaarion. Valtavasta kolmitahoisesta akvaariosta tulee sen keskipiste!

programme.title: Cats of Claw Hill
programme.desc: Animal Planetin uusi saippuadokumenttisarja valottaa kotikissojen yksityista maailmaa kiehtovasti seuraten kissojen arkielamaa "kissaperspektiivista".

programme.title: Cats of Claw Hill
programme.desc: Animal Planetin uusi saippuadokumenttisarja valottaa kotikissojen yksityista maailmaa kiehtovasti seuraten kissojen arkielamaa "kissaperspektiivista".

programme.title: The Vet Life
programme.desc: Kausi 4 osa 2/8. Elainlaakarit Blue, Ross ja Lavigne pyorittavat menestynytta klinikkaansa Houstonissa. Heidan asiakaskuntansa koostuu kaikenkarvaisista lemmikeista. (The Vet Life, tosi-tv, USA, 2019)

programme.title: Expedition Bigfoot
programme.desc: Russell tallentaa lampokuvia, joiden han uskoo olevan isojalka. Mireya ja Ronny kokevat kauhun hetkia tajutessaan, etteivat he ole metsassa yksin.

programme.title: Great Continental Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo ventures east to a land which a century ago was part of the Russian Empire and today is the independent state of Ukraine. His rail journey will take him from the grasslands of the Steppe to the shores of the Black Sea.

programme.title: Fatal Forecast
programme.desc: The ravages of flood waters can render any location instantly unrecognisable. Whether dry land becomes a river, or a river becomes a nightmare, raging floods let nothing get in their way. Floods are the most common and widespread of all weather-related natural disasters.

programme.title: Life Below Zero
programme.desc: From Alaskas north to its southern tip, Alaskans improvise as essential gear breaks down.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: Return to the Wild
programme.desc: Ben makes an unprecedented third visit to see his old friends Bill and Bob, elderly twins living in the canyons of Utah, and realises that their paranoia about the outside world has grown.

programme.title: The Secret Genius of Modern Life
programme.desc: Hannah takes a look at the vacuum cleaner, going behind the scenes with Dyson and discovering how the motor in their latest vacuum spins nine times faster than that of a Formula One race car.

programme.title: Fishing Impossible
programme.desc: The team journey up the coast of Norway and brave sub-zero temperatures as they meet the native Sami tribesmen for some ice fishing before taking a dog sled to their final location. 9/10

programme.title: Fatal Forecast
programme.desc: The ravages of flood waters can render any location instantly unrecognisable. Whether dry land becomes a river, or a river becomes a nightmare, raging floods let nothing get in their way. Floods are the most common and widespread of all weather-related natural disasters.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: Return to the Wild
programme.desc: Ben Fogle returns to Bulgaria to meet up with nomads Miriam and Peter after four years.

programme.title: The Blue Planet
programme.desc: Although 70 per cent of our planet is covered by water, the oceans and many of their inhabitants remain an unexplored mystery. This episode travels to the very depths of the seas to reveal a spectacular variety of life, some never filmed before.

programme.title: Life Below Zero
programme.desc: Sue travels home to Kavik. Andy and Denise return to Eagle. Jessie prepares for the Iditarod. The Hailstones do chores in Kiwalik.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild
programme.desc: Ben ventures to the Emerald Isle to visit Georg and Bettina, an elderly couple from Austria and Germany who made the Irish wilderness their home nearly 40 years ago.

programme.title: Inside the Factory
programme.desc: Paddy McGuinness visits a factory to explore the surprising process of turning potato starch into 500 million packs of Quavers cheese curls every year.

programme.title: Einstein and Hawking: Unlocking the Universe
programme.desc: One of 20th centurys greatest minds. Einstein created the theory of relativity, a tool to explore and predict the way the universe works - from its very creation to its ultimate demise.

programme.title: Ancient Powers
programme.desc: Each episode uses the very latest scientific and archaeological discoveries to reveal the tools, technologies, strategies and systems that decided the fate of the ancient world.

programme.title: Walking With Dinosaurs
programme.desc: The tale of one of the largest dinosaurs ever to walk the earth, a colossal, long-necked Lusotitan. Living 150 million years ago on an island known as the Iberian Mesta, now in Portugal, this 25-metre-long titan dwarfs every other dinosaur in the region. Yet its intimidating size is only part of the story. The ultimate goal of the male of the species is to win over a female and secure his legacy. Its a quest that will see him embark on an epic journey as he risks his life for love.

programme.title: Life Below Zero
programme.desc: Sue clears her runway of snow. Denise learns to dogsled. Jessie snares rabbits. Ricko teaches his son Skyler to hunt.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: Return to the Wild
programme.desc: Ben travels to Thailand to meet Paul and Sao, who he first visited in Cambodia. Paul and his family have build their version of an English castle.

programme.title: Simon Reeves Return to Cornwall
programme.desc: Simon Reeve is back to visit one of Britains favourite counties to discover what life is really like for the locals after the summer crowds have gone.

programme.title: Inside the Factory
programme.desc: Paddy McGuinness, Cherry Healey and Ruth Goodman get exclusive access to some of the largest factories in the world to reveal the secrets behind the epic-scale production of our favourite products. 4/6

programme.title: Life Below Zero
programme.desc: The Alaskan residents are either hunting birds to stock up their freezers, training their young families how to fish or training up a puppy to be a hunting dog.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: Return to the Wild
programme.desc: Ben Fogle revisits Rauri on Rathlin Island, who left HR for off-grid life. They repaint Rauris house and discuss his health struggles, and a daring journey he made to help those in need.

programme.title: Earth
programme.desc: We often think that its ice, fire or other elements that have forged and transformed the earth, but there is a force that has been just as powerful in changing Earths fate - plants.

programme.title: Fishing Impossible
programme.desc: In the wilderness of Northern Peru, the boys find themselves battling rough seas and desert landscapes in their quest to find a Humboldt Squid. Blowfish wants to catch one by hand to prove these feared creatures are misunderstood. 10/10

programme.title: Great Continental Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo travels one of the most stunning rail routes of the world, through the former Russian empire from the Black Sea to the Caspian Sea, taking in present-day Georgia and Azerbaijan.

programme.title: Fatal Forecast
programme.desc: No rain, no life. Thats the basic rule of survival on earth. Drought occurs in almost all types of climates. Of all the meteorological phenomena that can cause serious economic consequences, droughts are second only to hurricanes, according to the National Climatic Data Center. 5/8

programme.title: Life Below Zero
programme.desc: The Alaskan residents are either hunting birds to stock up their freezers, training their young families how to fish or training up a puppy to be a hunting dog.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: Return to the Wild
programme.desc: Ben Fogle revisits Rauri on Rathlin Island, who left HR for off-grid life. They repaint Rauris house and discuss his health struggles, and a daring journey he made to help those in need.

programme.title: The Secret Genius of Modern Life
programme.desc: With over six billion of them across the planet, smartphones have changed the modern world. With rare access to electronics giant Samsung, Hannah uncovers the technological game changers that have made the smartphone a reality. She finds out how 1940s comic book hero Dick Tracy inspired the first mobile phone, discovers why the invention of the digital camera led to one of the biggest commercial blunders of all time and reveals what a 2010 South Korean sausage frenzy can tell us about touchscreens.

programme.title: Asia: Making Of
programme.desc: A behind-the-scenes look at this dazzling exploration of Earths biggest and most varied continent, Asia.

programme.title: Fatal Forecast

programme.title: Joanna Lumleys Spice Trail Adventure
programme.desc: Joanna returns to her birthplace, India, starting in the majestic ancient city of Hampi, in search of a kitchen cupboard staple once known as black gold

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild
programme.desc: Ben heads to a remote corner of Spains Andalucan mountains to meet British couple Alan and Lorna, who have left their respective careers in Brighton to become alpaca farmers. He also goes in search of one of the worlds rarest big cats - the Iberian lynx.

programme.title: Life Below Zero
programme.desc: With Alaska in bloom, its residents must continue to utilize their days to pursue resources and opportunities to enrich their lives.

programme.title: Inside the Factory
programme.desc: Gregg Wallace is in the Netherlands at one of the worlds biggest sauce factories. Its annual output is a quarter of a million tonnes of condiments,and more than 50 of this heads to the UK. Meanwhile Cherry Healey is making the glass jars Gregg needs for his mayonnaise. Shes at a vast factory in Maastricht where a furnace holding 250 tonnes of molten glass has been running continuously for the last 11 years.

programme.title: Mammals
programme.desc: The dark, a world of opportunity for mammals. More than two-thirds prefer the cover of the night, with some now returning to the safety of the shadows in order to avoid us.

programme.title: Joanna Lumleys Spice Trail Adventure
programme.desc: Joanna Lumleys spice journey continues on the African island of Madagascar. Travelling overland, she discovers the secrets of the worlds second most expensive spice, vanilla.

programme.title: Life Below Zero
programme.desc: Denises dogs lead her to a moose whos protective of her calf whilst Sue sets off on a fishing trip. The Hailstones take their children to search for blueberries.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild
programme.desc: Ben ventures deep into the jungles of Guatemala, once home to an ancient Mayan civilisation but also Mike Merrill, a former sound engineer from Texas who is building a backpackers hostel.

programme.title: Mammals
programme.desc: Mammals have mastered every environment on Earth, but today the planet is changing faster than ever. Mammals must change with it to have a chance of survival in this, the new wild.

programme.title: Inside the Factory
programme.desc: Gregg visits Ribenas Gloucestershire factory, where 90% of Britains blackcurrants are turned into soft drinks. He is amazed to find out that the aroma of the blackcurrants is captured separately and later added back into the drink.

programme.title: Life Below Zero
programme.desc: Alaskans brave the awakening landscape as the end of Winter nears.

programme.desc: Ben journeys to one of Britains furthest outposts, the Shetland Islands, to meet Helen and Jason - a couple just a few years into their new life on the edge of the weather-beaten island of Yell.

programme.title: The Great Intelligence Test
programme.desc: The Great British Intelligence Test measures the brainpower of the nation in one of the largest intelligence experiments of its kind.

programme.title: The Worlds Deadliest Weather
programme.desc: Personal stories of those caught up in sometimes deadly natural catastrophes, accompanied by camera footage showing meteorological phenomena, including hurricanes, earthquakes, monsoons and more.

programme.desc: When Darwin and Gumball reveal how theyd spend their perfect day, Gumball confesses that he would spend it with Penny. programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Bean is both cajoled by Irma and spurred by his own jealousy of the fund-raising super-star Declan into raising money for the local donkey sanctuary. He tries to thwart Declans success and increase the amount of money hes raising until eventually he finds himself challenging Declan to a sky-diving competition.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: The Great Eduardo, violinist supreme, is in town and Irma wants to go to the concert. But Bean wont pay for the tickets. More than that, he claims that he can play the violin better. Now he has to prove it. After a lot of painful sawing, even Eduardo cant bear the noise. He offers to teach Bean, who ends up replacing him in the concert!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Miss Wince takes Mrs. Wicket off on holiday in her brand-new, swanky caravan; and Bean is left behind. Butnever one to let a setback knock his confidence, he decides to build his own caravan and sets off in search of the perfect quiet spot. All would be well if hed only not built the caravan out of Mrs. Wickets garden shed ...

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean is trying to impress some kids in the park with his football skills but winds up kicking their ball into a dilapidated, scary-looking house. He has to go in and get it back. A feral cat living inside decides to steal Teddy, and in the chase around the insides of the house Bean manages something not even a wrecking ball can do.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean accidentally spills all of Mrs. Wickets new, expensive perfume on the floor. In an attempt to hide his crime and refill the empty bottle, he tries to recreate the smell - by adding all sorts of odd and strange ingredients. He might be able to fool Mrs. Wicket, but can he fool Scrapper and all the neighbourhood cats?

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: When Sushi-Mushi breaks the only spoon he has ever cooked with, he declares his cooking days are over!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Chep wants to return a favour to Mush-Mush, but all Mush-Mush wants is to have a compost pancake on Pancake Day! But when the Food Snail falls for, and takes off after, the Travel Snail, Pancake Day has to be cancelled. Chep sees an opportunity to save the day for his friend!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: MMs favourite frog has had its home taken over by a lizard. Mushpot says not to interfere - nature must run its course. But Lilit feels so sorry for the frog she takes it back to Mushton where it causes havoc. Now our friends must lure the frog back to its home where it deals with the lizard itself.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Its Fool the Forest Day! Mushables pull pranks all over Mushton, and Mush-Mush has an epic one planned. But our Mushlers spill Chanterelles paint by accident, and now they must replace it by finding a rare Sloof beetle they have never heard of.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: When ants invade Fung and Miffs tree, our Mushlers offer for them to move in... but the two quickly turn out to be unbearable roommates. So when Fung and Miff break their trampoline, our friends decide its time for them to go back to their homes. But first they need to get rid of the ants...

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Mush-Mush and his friends are determined to win the bark sledge race, but their essential fourth team member drops out. Our friends ask Mushpot to step up from being their coach to racing with them. The Mushelder is reluctant at first but soon reveals the tough competitor he is!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have laid hand on special magnets which turn any object they are stuck to into flying objects. Grizzy bears the consequences and is ejected out of the cabin on his couch, which has turned into a flying-couch. Upon landing, Grizzy discovers by chance that the magnet stuck to his forehead enables him to fly like Peter Pan.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: With a lion-tamers whip, a sugar bowl and lots of work, the Lemmings have successfully trained a caribou to go through their obstacle course. Grizzy cannot help but admire the performance. He decides to steal their idea, and the caribou, to create his own circus act and impress his lovely she-bear.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy happens onto the electronic version of the "Ranger Lemming" toy which is capable of reproducing the movements one teaches it, like a smart robot. Grizzy immediately grasps the potential of a robot that could perform chores with rapidity and precision, but the Lemmings would rather teach it to dance.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Rangers cabin is equipped with an ultra-effective pest detector capable of sensing the presence of an intruder, then chasing it out by emitting a wave that instructs the creatures brain to leave at once. Grizzy and the Lemmings are no longer able to stay inside, until they discover that the boxs remote-control device allows you to select which type of animal will be spared or targeted by the wave.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy finds himself unwillingly caught up in a race between two teams of Lemmings. When he understands the stakes, he tries to win but loses. Grizzy has his pride: he wants a re-match.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have placed giant remote-controlled hydraulic jacks under the cabin to transform it into a life-sized rolling ball game. Grizzy, who in inclined to seasickness, tries to put things back in place. The cabin tips over into empty space.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy is disturbed during his nap by flies buzzing incessantly around his head. When he realizes that the carnivorous plant upon which the Lemmings are playing rodeo feeds off flying insects, he decides to confiscate it and use it as an anti-fly weapon.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Even for a giant seven foot bear, its not easy getting rid of pesky lemmings but its all fun seeing them constantly try to outsmart each other with cheeky plans

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Exasperated by the Lemmings who prevent him from watching his favorite TV show in peace, Grizzy catapults them out of the cabin. One of them passes through the northern lights and undergoes a strange mutation: he now has the power to control metal with his mind.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest rangers house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels its only natural that the rangers house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bears privilege"except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean is out shopping when it starts to rain. Taking refuge in a trendy coffee bar, Bean is fascinated both by the brewing machinery andthe amount of money people will pay for small cups of coffee! Scenting a fortune to be made, Bean opens up his own, strange, successful coffee bar ...

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean wakes up on a freezing cold winters morning to discover that the boiler is broken and no sign of the repairman.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Irma wants a romantic break; Bean doesnt. Its too expensive. Irma kidnaps Teddy and refuses to give him back unless Bean promises to take her to Paris. Caught between his inability to pay and his love of Teddy Bean doesnt know what to do! Until he spots a cat beauty competition in which first prize is a romantic break in Paris - if only he can catch Scrapper ...

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Bean wants to avoid lunch with Irmas Mum at all costs. He persuades Mrs. Wicket to let him join her on a coach trip to a concert.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Bean is showing Irma his favourite tree in the park one day when he discovers a tree surgeon getting ready to cut it down. He darts up the tree and wont come back down. Irma loves this new side of Bean-ey! The tree surgeon is frustrated and tries various ploys to get Bean down. But can Bean make it to the toilet without being discovered and still save that tree?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket is persuaded by a jaunty estate agent to put her house up for sale. Bean is distraught -where will he live? Not Mrs. Wickets problem. Bean decides to hi-jack the sales process in order to deter all potential buyers -even if it means turning the whole house upside down!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Chep is super happy to have Amanita become a collector as well. Until she starts getting better at collecting than he is!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Our Mushlers discover a super-sticky tree sap and use it to have lots of fun until Mush-Mush gets stuck to Muddlers back.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: When things go missing from everyones home-trees, our Mushlers get on the case to catch the culprit.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Morel notices a Mushlet who is too shy to join in with the others. He realizes why the Mushlet is so shy -- they are in awe of Mush-Mush. Morel gets Mush-Mush to boost the Mushlets confidence.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Chep discovers he is great at giving snails massages. But the Food and Travel Snails now want massages all the time. Exhausting! Chep has to learn how to tell them NO!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings pace around the log cabin searching for virtual animals to capture with their tablet game. Annoyed by their behavior, Grizzy throws them outside. Determined to continue playing, the Lemmings trick the bear. But when the tablet hits the circuit breaker and explodes, the gaming animals come to life! Ice dinosaurs, laser caribous and giant carnivorous plants. The life-size hunt can begin!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: A snowstorm rips the solar panels off the log cabin and Grizzy can no longer watch TV or enjoy the comforts of home! But he has a brilliant idea. He produces electricity by making a caribou run on a treadmill, using the last carrot in the house as bait. But the Lemmings absolutely want his carrot to make the perfect snowman.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy discovers in shock that the TV has been replaced with a trompe-loeil image. Furious, he flushes the Lemmings out of their hiding place where theyd hoped to watch their favorite cartoon in peace and propels them as far as possible. They land in an ancient cave where a powerful spirit capable of entering individuals is asleep. The Lemmings decide to free the spirit and send it to Grizzy. But will they be able to control the spirit?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Not easy to enjoy a DVD about salmon when the Lemmings are having a disco party right there. Grizzy sends them packing with such force that they land at the research station, where they discover a state-of-the-art U.V. cabin. When turned up to the max, the light therapy and music options can advantageously replace the disco equipment Grizzy destroyed. The noise they make causes a block of ice to break off. It hurdles down the slope to the cabin and destroys Grizzys TV. But it doesnt take the bear long to figure out that the U.V. cabin also has a DVD function.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have fun destroying ice towers. When Grizzy sees them, it inspires him to sculpt statues of himself. The Lemmings cannot resist the temptation to destroy the statues of Grizzy, who does everything in his power to protect them.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: A container adrift along the icefield will change the lives of Grizzy and the Lemmings: its an inexhaustible stock of chocolate spread! There is so much, that for the first time the close enemies have no need to fight over the treat. They entice a flock of penguins into hoisting the container out of the water. One of the penguins, who did not get his reward in fish, is disgruntled. Grizzy has him taste the Yummy, then throws the jar far away to get rid of the penguin. The chocolate treat spreads over the icefield. Fatal error?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy uses a fire extinguisher to chase the Lemmings from the living room so that he can take a nap, but the gadget accidentally flies out the window. It lands at the top of an ice cliff, causing a fissure, and the peak of the cliff topples. Amid the debris, the Lemmings discover a fearsome creature: the Yeti, who is looking for the guilty party. The Lemmings bring him to Grizzy, never dreaming that the giant will immediately fall in love with the Rangers cabin and throw a very original party.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings are bored. A coconut rolls over to Grizzys feet, pulling the bear out of his state of torpor. He imagines a sort of face on the nut and decides to care for it, like a child with its doll. He has so much fun playing with his new toy that the Lemmings want to join in. But when the bear refuses, the Lemmings ruse: they hide inside other coconuts in hopes of being adopted by Grizzy!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: While bickering with the Lemmings over control of the TV, Grizzy sees an illustration that gives him an idea. In a medical book, a person whose leg is in a cast is being served dinner in front of a TV. Grizzy pretends to have a twisted ankle and shows the Lemmings the patient care illustrations. The imaginary invalid Grizzy is so convincing that the Lemmings fall for the trick. They think that the sooner Grizzy is healed, the sooner they will be able to throw him out of the cabin as planned.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: On the beach, the Lemmings have set up a mini funfair for tourists. Each attraction lets you to win tickets, which are then used to collect prizes from a vending machine. Grizzy, who is not very good at games of skill, steals the tickets collected by the Lemmings in order to obtain the jackpot. The Lemmings decide to create an attraction just for him.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Bean wants to avoid lunch with Irmas Mum at all costs. He persuades Mrs. Wicket to let him join her on a coach trip to a concert.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Bean is showing Irma his favourite tree in the park one day when he discovers a tree surgeon getting ready to cut it down. He darts up the tree and wont come back down. Irma loves this new side of Bean-ey! The tree surgeon is frustrated and tries various ploys to get Bean down. But can Bean make it to the toilet without being discovered and still save that tree?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket is persuaded by a jaunty estate agent to put her house up for sale. Bean is distraught -where will he live? Not Mrs. Wickets problem. Bean decides to hi-jack the sales process in order to deter all potential buyers -even if it means turning the whole house upside down!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean wants to learn skateboarding but hurts himself on his first try. Meanwhile, Miss Wince is showing off her new mobility scooter at Mrs. Wickets. Bean is entranced. He could do wicked ollies with that! He absconds with a souped-up scooter and heads straight to the skate park, ready to challenge Bruiser Senior and Junior ...

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket becomes annoyingly inconsolable when Scrapper goes missing -calling for him at all hours of the day and night. Bean cant get any sleep! He decides that the only way to restore peace in the household is to go out and find Scrapper himself -a journey that takes him deep into Londons sewers ...

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy finds a phial containing a love potion: anyone who drinks it immediately falls in love with the first creature he sees. Grizzy already imagines himself becoming irresistible in the eyes of his beloved she-bear. But that is without taking into account the Lemmings... clumsiness, and their rodeo caribou drinking the magic potion.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings notice that Grizzy moves away from the jar of chocolate spread whenever he chases the fly buzzing around him.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy discovers the rangers collection of bird calls by chance. With a simple blow of the whistle, he can attract a flock of partridges that are at his beck and call.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: While fighting over a jar of chocolate spread, Grizzy and the Lemmings set off a chain reaction which sends the jar flying into space, where it damages a space station.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Even for a giant seven foot bear, its not easy getting rid of pesky lemmings but its all fun seeing them constantly try to outsmart each other with cheeky plans.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy wants to try out the brand new packaging format of chocolate spread that he discovers in the rangers cupboard: a yummy-looking XXL jar. And he does not intend to share it with the Lemmings. After observing a chameleon toad that is able to blend into its surroundings, the Lemmings decide to make themselves invisible to attain Grizzys treasure.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: In the season two premiere episode, the gang force an over-worked Fred (FRANK WELKER) to relax and take some time off from mystery solving.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: The gang rushes Scooby to an animal hospital when he suddenly falls ill. But things go from bad to worse when they discover the Gothic, old hospital is also home to a rampaging werewolf!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Bam must learn to adapt and try something new as hes tasked to dive the Bat Big Rig all the way to Star City, while the Legion of Zoom chases after him.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When MOE creates a new, super sparkly vehicle paint, the Batwheels decide to put on a talent show to see who will get a shiny new makeover! / To ease the burden on MOE, the Batwheels use his duplicating machine to make copies of their repair bot, but the Batcave is soon overrun when the machine breaks!

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders are hired to build an outdoor movie theater in the park. / The Looney Builders discover Zippy, an acrobatic flea, living on Sylvesters back.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Having just gone out to have a great picnic, the Tinkers are surprised by the rain and have to retreat inside; while the team is desperate to find something to do, Porky has a genius idea.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean buys an expensive dress for Irma which he plans to return - so has to protect it from damage. / Mr Bean goes to buy the biggest TV in the world only to find that it has a price- tag to match.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: When Mr. Bean breaks his favourite Royal mug he discovers theres only one place to buy a replacement: Buckingham Palace, home of the Queen of England. When one of Her Majestys corgis runs off with his teddy, Bean gives chase through secret tunnels and gets lost.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is painting a picture of Teddy when he accidently squirts some green paint onto his brown wallpaper. Oh no! Bean needs to redecorate his room fast but ends up painting all the walls a garish lime green instead of brown. Hes so terrified of Mrs Wicket finding out that when he goes to bed he has some very weird nightmares with a rather sickly ending.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is no fan of wrestling. But hes promised to take Mrs Wicket and her friend Mrs Wince to a big wrestling match in town. Bean finds himself lost backstage at the stadium and accidentally wanders through a door and straight into the wrestling ring where he finds himself up against Side Kick Rick. More by luck than talent Bean wins the match only to find that now he has to fight the terrifying Bruise Force.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean needs to see a very rare bird so he can tick off every page in his bird-spotting book. But he soon gets bored as he waits in a hide for the rare bird to appear. Instead he goes home and paints a picture of the bird cuts it out and sticks it high up a tree in the back garden. Soon he is besieged by excited twitchers who think it really is the rare bird. They are all keen to get a snap and theyre willing to pay good money for a peek.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Boss takes on a particularly enormous sailor in a seedy underground arm wrestling tournament. Who knew old Boss such grit?

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Victory! The Docs finally catch Lamput but the timing could not be worse, because Boss Mom is here to visit and she does not take kindly to her friend Lamput being imprisoned. Against his better judgement but to please his mother, Boss orders the Docs to chaperone and serve Boss Mom and Lamput as they spend time shopping, being pampered and spoiling themselves. Lamput cant believe his luck and the Docs cant believe theirs either! But when Boss Mom finds herself in mild peril, theres a chance of redemption and the possibility of a her finding a new favourite.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Specs And Skinny are late to work and Boss is mighty angry! The Docs cook up a quick, fake story of how they were chasing Lamput all over the city. It was a real tough chase across various terrains and thats what got them late to work!Boss calmly hears out their story and then opens his cabinet to show Lamput already caught and sitting there in a jar! The Docs sweat! We now see the Docs running all over the various terrains of the city with Boss chasing them on his scooter!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy is persuaded that hes discovered the ultimate gadget for good living: a pair of connected glasses for watching TV in panoramic view, with all sorts of indicators, namely an intrusion warning signal. There is only one real drawback: the speedometer function which the Lemmings adore.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings clamor for their turn to play with the rangers mobile phone, but Grizzy isnt in the sharing mood. And hes very talented at flattening anything that comes near, without looking up from his game. The Lemmings invent an implacable protection system which should enable them to recover the mobile in complete safety.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy is captivated by a mime artist on TV who makes viewers believe in the presence of an invisible wall. To get rid of the Lemmings, who have sights on his jar of Yummy, Grizzy hides the jar and pretends he has an invisible one. When the Lemmings see through the trick, they decide to trap Grizzy with a grand illusion number.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings shiver with cold, sneeze and are glassy-eyed: they have a big fat cold! They look so pitiful that Grizzy doesnt have the heart to throw them into the void, even if they are extremely annoying when they try to snuggle up to him to keep warm. He decides to heal them: the quicker they get better, the quicker Grizzy will be able to get rid of them pitilessly.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings find a pack of icy mints that literally chill your breath. One blast from anyone who eats them freezes everything in sight. Grizzy does not particularly care for this frosty ambiance and tries to take their candy away.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy cant believe it: he has just swallowed a spoonful of his favorite food, chocolate spread, and he hates it! How could that be possible? And yet, when he swiped the jar from the Lemmings, they seemed to be enjoying it immensely. A quick investigation reveals that the Lemmings added a dash of lemon juice to the jar to give the spread a sharper taste. And they intend to jazz up the rest of the stock as well!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Its time for the annual croquet tournament at the Manor. The butler tells Tom how important it is to the Lady of the Manor to always winno matter what! The last thing they need is any pesky rodents interfering with the game. Knowing any sighting of Jerry or Tuffy would cast Tom in a bad light, hes determined to keep them off the lawn.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom is put in charge of getting the manors dog into showdog shape, unfortunately Jerry will try to sabotage him.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: When Rick and Ginger go to a couples retreat, they leave Tom with Ricks Auntie Louella. Hearing that shes a whiz in the kitchen, Jerry comes along. The old woman is sweet, but she has a nasty little lap dog that bedevils Tom like crazy. Louella keeps treating Tom poorly, and Tom and Jerry make their plans to escape.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: The Lady of the Houses cousins, the Van der Snoots, visit with their prize-winning Persian cat, Prancy Van der Snoot. Tom is warned to make sure that Snooty doesnt catch sight of the pesky manor mice, lest she get upset or dirty her snowy white paws chasing the vermin. Tom is on it, but nothing goes as planned...

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom is watching a hypnotist on TV, when the words "you are asleep" hit him hard. He becomes a virtual rag doll and ends up in a jumble of junk for Rick and Gingers yard sale. A woman who thinks hes a stuffed animal buys him. Jerry feels bad and hops aboard the car to rescue Tom.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom accidentally visits a bizarre twin version of his house.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Redbird sacrifices his stealth muffler tech to sound as loud as the other Batwheels but his modifications backfire when Robin needs his stealthy skills to catch the elusive Catwoman!

programme.title: Batwheels

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series

programme.desc: Mrs. Wickets Nephew is staying with her when he wins two tickets to an Outward Boundcourse. She refuses to go, but then ropes in Bean to look after the child. programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: After seeing the flashy electric go-kart Mr Paliwal has bought for his daughter Divya, Mr Bean and Billy build their own using items around Mrs Wickets garden. programme.desc: Grizzy is exhausted and the couch has never seemed so enticing! He goes to fetch a pillow and a sleeping mask, but the Lemmings have entirely different plans for the couch.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy decides to give she-bear the flowers that decorate the window ledges of the rangers cabin. Can he bring them to her without the Lemmings ruining them?

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: After snagging an ultra-fuel-cell upgrade, the Ducky Boat suddenly becomes the fastest vehicle in Gotham. Later, confident leader Bam must rally the Batwheels to stop the turbo-Ducky!

programme.title: Batwheels

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: George P. Mandrake hires The Looney Builders to build a T. Rex fossil. / Chef Poyung Panda hires The Looney Builders to build her a Dim Sum bus in China. Bugs worries about letting down his favorite chef.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Pauleen Penguin hires The Looney Builders to build her a home in Looneyburg. Lola soon discovers they got the design wrong and the crew has to make adjustments.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: As Grizzy relaxes in the massage chair, a cloud drifts in front of the sun, immediately stopping the electricity supply in the log cabin. The voltage drops continue, even though the sky seems clear now. Grizzy looks out the window and a dragon appears on the horizon! Once over his initial fright, the bear realizes that its only a kite flown by the Lemmings using the electricity from the cabin they have rerouted!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest rangers house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels its only natural that the rangers house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bears privilege"except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings organize a drone race throughout the cabin. Grizzy, who was on the verge of falling asleep, interrupts the competition but must contend with the rodents reprisals. Thrown out of the cabin, the bear falls onto a temple dedicated to the Monkey King. He appropriates the statues powers, operating a magic cloud by remote control. Grizzy settles in on the cloud and wins the race before the Lemmings. But a cloud that flies that fast can only arouse lust...

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: To trick Grizzys vigilance and steal the TV, the Lemmings, disguised as traditional Chinese dancers, perform a number that leaves the bear flabbergasted. The rodents take advantage of their diversion to carry off the TV set on their airborne craft made of Chinese umbrellas. But before they can escape with their bounty, Grizzy recovers the screen. Ever as determined, the Lemmings come back after upgrading their vessel.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Annoyed by a noisy high-speed chase between the Lemmings and a raccoon, Grizzy abruptly stops the game. The players fall into empty space and land in a clearing.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: On the way back from a fishing outing, Grizzy unwittingly brings back an electrode that controls a robot. Once activated, the gadget puts itself in the service of the bear, satisfying his each and every need. The envious Lemmings plot to take possession of this new metallic ally. They manage to evict the bear, who does not intend to take this lying down especially when he discovers a pair of robotic arms hidden in a module that fell out of the robot!

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Specs and Skinny get the day off from Lamput chasing, and receive a super important assignment: go to the train station, and pick up the Boss beloved mom. The Boss really needs to reassess his delegation choices.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Lamput likes nothing more than a pleasant evening watching the night sky for UFOs. The peaceful night is ruined, of course, by those pesky Docs. Which is a shame, because its the one night where a UFO actually appears. Of the aliens who emerge from the strange craft, one bears a striking resemblance to Skinny - and naturally theres a bit of a mixup. The alien gets to live life as a Doc at the Lab. Hes pretty good at it, too. Skinny has to make his way as the pilot of a spaceship. Hes pretty bad at it too. In the end, the foreign food is the last straw, and both parties agree to resume their old lives. Lamput goes back to watching the skies.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Catastrophe strikes!! The Boss has a shaving accident that costs him his glorious Tache! It really stirs up some deep seated family issues for him.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: While trying to escape from the Docs at a small sea side town, Lamput meets a lonely sea monster. Lamput attempts to help the sea monster makes friends but all his plans backfires. Now the locals are enraged, and the docs take the opportunity to stir up an angry mob to take down the creature and catch Lamput in the process! Not unless Lamputs new friend has anything to say about it.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is at the supermarket when he spots a cool fire engine ride but the security guard makes it clear its for little kids only. Not to be deterred, Mr Bean tries everything he can to distract the guard to have his go on the ride. When he finally does get his go, its not as good as he thought it would be, especially when a real fire engine has to be called to help Mr Bean!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Theres easy money to be had in the art world and Mr. Bean is set on getting some of it. Once equipped with the right tools, he ventures into the countryside with a blank canvas in search of inspiration and comes home with a painting full of life. Literally.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series

Until he spots a cat beauty competition in which first prize is a romantic break in Paris - if only he can catch Scrapper ...

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Puff doesnt like change much. And with spring about to burst forth and all the changes spring brings, he is puffing out nervous fog which is blanketing the whole of Mushton. Mush-Mush and friends need to get Puff to relax and celebrate spring together with all the other Mushables!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: So Mushpie can take a break, Mush-Mush, Chep and Lilit offer to look after the Mushies, assuring her that everything will be fine. But a Mushie pops to become a Mushlet and escapes. Our friends find him in Muddlers clutches! Now, they must figure out a way to save the Mushlet and return the other Mushies to their cave before the return of Mushpie.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: The Mushlets love Mush-Mushs heroic stories. But when they demand to see him actually do something heroic, Mush-Mush feels he cant back out... and so ends up stuck up a cliff. Relieved to be rescued by Chep and Lilit, Mush-Mush is about to admit that he isnt a hero when the Mushlets find themselves in danger. Now Mush-Mush has no choice but to be a real hero!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Chanterelle has built a whistle that can reproduce the most beautiful sound of the forest: the one of the Nightingale. When the whistle disappears, Mush-Mush, Chep and Lilit soon discover that it has been stolen by a beetle. In order to finally hear what a real Nightingale sounds like, theyll have to get it back!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Wanting to rush off to climb Mush Mountain, Mush-Mush is in a hurry checking nectar level in flowers... a job that takes time and care. Soon Mush-Mushs haste causes disaster when he scares all the bees away. Now Mush-Mush and friends have to find a way to lure the bees back...

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Mush-Mush is amazed by the way Mushpot uses his staff of wisdom and how awesome it makes him look. Mush-Mush wants to be as cool as Mushpot and asks him to lend him his staff of wisdom. But the staff comes with a lot of responsibilities...

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Woken with a start by a nightmare filled with Lemmings, Grizzy stumbles on the Rangers dream machine. Its a headphone set where you can program the theme of your choice before falling asleep within seconds for a night filled with sweet dreams. But who could possibly sleep soundly surrounded by Lemmings who want their fair share too?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy happens onto an old American India medallion bearing the symbol of the wind. He who wears it has the power to command air streams. Grizzy would be quite content to never leave the sofa again and control things from a distance, but the Lemmings want it to create fantastic new games that literally blow you away.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: A magic horn lands on the muzzle of a moose, endowing it with grace and the ability to fly. It soars off, leaving a rainbow-colored streak in its wake. When Grizzy sees this strange creature, he dreams of taming it as a gift for his beloved she-bear, while the Lemmings imagine themselves playing rodeo on a bucking unicorn.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: A magic horn lands on the muzzle of a moose, endowing it with grace and the ability to fly. When Grizzy sees this strange creature, he dreams of taming it as a gift for she-bear while the Lemmings imagine themselves playing rodeo.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: While looking for the TV remote-control device Grizzy happens onto a box that can localize a bunch of keys thanks to its key ring which is equipped with a tracker.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: While looking for the TV remote-control device, Grizzy happens onto a box that can localize a bunch of keys thanks to its key ring, which is equipped with a tracker. Grizzy decides to stick the spy device under a jar of chocolate spread, just in case the Lemmings should decide to carry it off.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings create a customized hang-glider using a supermarket shopping cart for the nacelle and a ventilator as an engine. Their aerobatics fascinate the she-bear that Grizzy is in love with, which gives him the idea of replacing the shopping cart with a double-seat and inviting his beloved for a sky promenade. But confiscating a wing in mid-flight is not within the reach of just any old bear.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings scribble all over the book Snow White on the living room sofa. Grizzy throws them off with scant ceremony and they crash to the floor with their book.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings favorite chocolate spread brand is organizing a big competition where the prize is a giant jar of spread. To win, one must make ten baskets in a row in a hoop set up on a supermarket parking lot for the occasion. Ready to play?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Freed from the ice which had preserved him for millions of years, a saber-toothed bear bursts into the cabin, starving to death. Grizzy fails to protect his reserves while the Lemmings fail at taming him for the rodeo - even though they all team up. But when they realize that a prehistoric necklace will enable them to control the creature, its each man for himself again!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean wants to learn skateboarding but hurts himself on his first try. Meanwhile, Miss Wince is showing off her new mobility scooter at Mrs. Wickets. Bean is entranced. He could do wicked ollies with that! He absconds with a souped-up scooter and heads straight to the skate park, ready to challenge Bruiser Senior and Junior ...

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket becomes annoyingly inconsolable when Scrapper goes missing -calling for him at all hours of the day and night. Bean cant get any sleep! He decides that the only way to restore peace in the household is to go out and find Scrapper himself -a journey that takes him deep into Londons sewers ...

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Bean discovers Mrs. Wickets nephew and Bruiser Jnr swapping football stickers and decides that he wants to fill up a sticker album too.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean thinks hes just dug up a valuable coin in the back-garden and goes rushing off to the Museum to have it valued.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Bean discovers Declan giving Irma a lift in his swanky new SUV. Bean is unimpressed until Declan shows off all the cars features. Undeterred, Bean professes his car superior. Declan issues a challenge -to see which car Irma will choose for her lift back to work. Bean decides his car may need a little pimping ...

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mrs. Wickets Nephew is staying with her when he wins two tickets to an Outward Boundcourse. She refuses to go, but then ropes in Bean to look after the child. The two start a competition to see who will win the trophy. Bean is a relentless competitor, winning everything up until the point things start getting out of hand ...

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Mush-Mush goes on an adventure with Morel and Sushi-Mushi. He worries he wont be cool enough to fit in with the older Mushables, so makes Chep come along for support.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Lilit loves dancing. The only Mushable she hasnt danced with is Amanita. But Amanita doesnt dance. Can Lilit get her dancing?

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Miff has a blast playing a game with our Mushlers -- one that Fung refused to play. Now Fung worries that he has lost his best friend, and so tries to win her back.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: To prove to everyone that he does not make cooking mistakes, Sushi-Mushi revisits his chef training. But what he really needs training in, is admitting mistakes!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Lilit is finding getting some "alone time" to herself tricky. So when she finds an old shell to hang out in the forest, she is rapt and doesnt want to share it.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings discover that oysters can make pearls almost instantaneously: just put an object inside their shell and its automatically coated with mother-of-pearl The game of marbles that the Lemmings have invented with pearls is driving Grizzy crazy. He manages to catapult the Lemmings far away. But at the ocean bottom, they discover a giant oyster. All they need to create a giant-scale marble game!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have adopted a small exotic fish thats lively and affectionate and have fun decorating its aquarium. Jealous, Grizzy finds a fish too, but his is expressionless and indifferent to the bears efforts to communicate. Grizzy plots to exchange the two fish behind the Lemmings backs. He puts the affectionate fish in an even bigger aquarium with a pharaonic decor and locks the lid. But the Lemmings have no intention of leaving their friend to Grizzy.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings use all the cans and tins they can get their hands on to build a beach slide. Grizzy, annoyed at not finding his tinned fish to prepare his meal tray, recovers them from the Lemmings. In their struggle, Grizzy loses his badge! Grizzy and the Lemmings now fight over a valuable metal detector that each party needs to accomplish their goal: build a slide or find the beloved badge.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings take a liking to an endangered crab on the beach and decide to shelter it from a seagull who is using its shell to open coconuts. They bring it home to a disgruntled Grizzy, who wants to watch TV in peace while snacking on Cheetos. When the Lemmings turn into full-fledged crab rescuers, the house is soon overrun with crustaceans. Grizzy decides to use the seagull to get rid of the crabs. But the Lemmings - ready to do anything to protect their new friends - embark the entire house, like a raft on water.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings play pirates on a beached boat. Grizzy, who is fishing further down, realizes that with the Lemmings boat, he could come closer to a zone thats teeming with fish. Grizzy takes a malicious pleasure playing pirate himself to unseat the Lemmings and steal their boat. The Lemmings discover a chest containing real pirate belongings. A telescope conjures the owners ghost who immediately places his saber and hook at their disposal.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy sets sail with his fishing gear. But he has no intention of fishing: its a scheme to enjoy a jar of Yummy chocolate spread alone in peace. The Lemmings sense the subterfuge and sink his boat to get the treat, which sinks to the ocean depths. The characters dive in pursuit and discover a school of intelligent crabs that live in an underwater city. Their treasure is a substance thats even yummier than Yummy.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings find the cabin upside down. Upon closer inspection, it looks like an epic battle took place there. And Grizzy isnt here. The curious Lemmings start imagining what could have happened, visualizing the most improbable scenes for us. They decide to follow their lead to find Grizzy and confirm their zany theories.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy dreams of drinking some nice cold coconut milk on the couch. Step one, get rid of the Lemmings who are having fun flying through the living room. Two, find coconuts that havent been emptied of their nectar. While Grizzy struggles to pick coconuts that are too high up, the Lemmings find a magic conch. By simply dusting yourself with its sand, you can fly! It doesnt take Grizzy long to figure this out and the bear rapidly imagines himself as Peter Pan sipping on his easily-harvested coconut milk.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy wants to watch TV in peace. The Lemmings have other plans: they want to have fun playing music with homemade instruments. Exasperated by the racket theyre making in the garage, Grizzy destroys the instruments and sends the Lemmings flying. The Lemmings discover a magic ukulele that bewitches anyone who hears its music: the perfect tool to regain control of the cabin and get back to their concert.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy cant sleep because its too hot. He decides to confiscate the fans the Lemmings use to power their fake spaceship. Totally into their Space Opera game, the Lemmings try to repel the alien Grizzy with "laser" party favors and are propelled onto an "unknown planet": a volcano crater with a secret base where a rocket is ready to take off. The rocket carries the cabin into space. Its no longer a game: Grizzy and the Lemmings will have to face the dangers of outer space!

programme.desc: Bean discovers Mrs. Wickets nephew and Bruiser Jnr swapping football stickers and decides that he wants to fill up a sticker album too.

Declan issues a challenge -to see which car Irma will choose for her lift back to work. Bean decides his car may need a little pimping ...
