The two start a competition to see who will win the trophy. Bean is a relentless competitor, winning everything up until the point things start getting out of hand ...

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean and Teddy have no plans, so decide to stay in bed all day. Mr Bean is determined that his feet cant touch the ground, so he pushes the bed around with a broom. He has to find ingenious ways to make his tea and toast for breakfast, brush his teeth and an even bigger challenge of ordering a pizza and collecting it from downstairs without getting out of bed!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: A magic tomahawk divides Grizzy into two identical bears with diametrically opposite personalities: one short-tempered, the other super-sweet. The Lemmings, who did not witness Grizzys split, will have a hard time working out the behavior of their usual enemy, who seems to swing from excessive kindness to the worst trickery for no reason.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: After studying a magazine advertisement with a couple standing in front of an SUV Grizzy imagines that if only he had a nice car his favorite she-bear would be

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: While chasing the Lemmings, who stole his jar of chocolate spread, Grizzy crashes into an arcade cabinet near the supermarket which displays a model fortune teller and her crystal ball. Grizzy realizes that he can foresee events that are going to happen to him in the crystal ball, and namely the traps that the Lemmings have planned for him.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: A newly unpacked UV tanning booth holds the place of honor in the middle of the cabin. Grizzy gets it into his head that a classy tan will help him draw the attention of the she-bear hes enamored with. When he opens the box, he discovers that the Lemmings have beat him to it and are already playing "beach party" inside the bed.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have turned the entire cabin topsy-turvy to organize medieval jousts with the rangers fencing gear. Grizzy, who wishes to recover his couch, tries to straighten up, but is driven out by their fencing foils. To retaliate, Grizzy must find a blade equal to the task. He opts for a fine... frozen swordfish!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: A strange object is delivered to the Rangers cabin: an over-board! Its a latest generation skateboard which levitates above the ground without wheels.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: The gang heads to a Renaissance Faire where they must stop an evil court jester from ending the kings reignpermanently!

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: When the ghost of a small towns founder returns to scare off mayoral candidates, the gang decides to run Velma as mayor to bait the ghost. They quickly discover however, that Velma lacks the skill set to make her a popular politician.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: To ease the burden on MOE, the Batwheels use his duplicating machine to make copies of their repair bot, but the Batcave is soon overrun when the machine breaks!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Super-genius villain Egghead is on the loose, planning to use Gotham Museums famed giant egg to cook up a record-breaking breakfast.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Thanks to a mysterious bag of magic beans, Bugs meets Elmer, a gentle giant who would like to build a castle in the clouds; its the perfect mission for DIYers.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Fosse Ferret hires The Looney Builders to build a stage for the kids dance recital. / Its Tazs birthday, so The Looney Builders build him a huge ice cream sundae.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is at the supermarket when he spots a cool fire engine ride but the security guard makes it clear its for little kids only. Not to be deterred, Mr Bean tries everything he can to distract the guard to have his go on the ride. When he finally does get his go, its not as good as he thought it would be, especially when a real fire engine has to be called to help Mr Bean!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: How does Mr Bean know Teddy? Could he drive a mini at the age of ten? How long has he known Mrs Wicket? Bean takes us on a journey into the past to answer these and many more questions.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean visits a safari park where he catches the attention of a baby monkey and unknowingly takes the monkey home in his Mini. After hearing on the news that the monkey has been "stolen", Bean attempts to return it without getting caught.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean fancies a game of golf so he creates his own golf course inside his flat and invites Irma to join him for a round. Their somewhat eccentric game takes them from sitting room to bathroom and through Mrs Wickets flat as they battle to be the winner of the First Bean Open Championship.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: A crafty cat burglar is causing alarm and concern throughout the town with a series of daring rooftop robberies. After Mrs Wickets house is burgled and Bean has his wallet stolen he decides the only way to deal with this cunning housebreaker is to don a costume and become a superhero (like the ones in his favourite comic book). But Super Bean soon finds he has his hands full helping to rescue cats stuck in trees and old ladies with their spilled shopping.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Boss shows hes still got it in the inventin department by coming up with a brain-swapping raygun. Just what the world needs. The Boss glory is short lived, though, when the raygun starts going off randomly. The Boss and Lamput trade places, and we get to see what it looks like when the worst boss in the world can also freak you out by morphing into orange stuff. Everyones acting topsy turvy, so its up to Specs and Skinny to straighten things out. Lucky those guys dont have brains to swap.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: In an accident during a chase, Lamput ends up getting stuck to Specs! Since they are literally inseparable, they bond over time until Boss commands Specs to return to the Lab.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Lamput decides to help distressed duck parents find their missing children. But the ducklings are too much for him to handle!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy discovers the fondness of his beloved she-bear for meditation. To seduce her he sets out to prove to her that he too can attain the Zen attitude.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings discover a super-secret Canadian Army prototype which resembles a simple computer keyboard. It has only several command keys: select, cut and paste, and delete, but the keys act directly on surrounding elements... as well as on living beings!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings are having a blast with a bowling game they found in the Rangers storeroom. Grizzy hastens to destroy the pins to ensure his peace and quiet. But the Lemmings discover a remote-control device that can modify the balls weight. By setting it on maximum, the ball could knock over much more than pins: furniture, a bear and even a log cabin!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: After the rains, to the great delight of the Lemmings, strange bouncing mushrooms have sprouted in the yard. To put an end to the Lemmings noisy games - which prevent Grizzy from enjoying his peace and quiet - Grizzy tramples the mushrooms. Only to realize that each crushed mushroom frees a cloud of spores that instantly creates... a bunch of identical mushrooms.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have laid hand on special magnets which turn any object they are stuck to into flying objects. Grizzy bears the consequences and is ejected out of the cabin on his couch, which has turned into a flying-couch. Upon landing, Grizzy discovers by chance that the magnet stuck to his forehead enables him to fly like Peter Pan.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: With a lion-tamers whip, a sugar bowl and lots of work, the Lemmings have successfully trained a caribou to go through their obstacle course. Grizzy cannot help but admire the performance. He decides to steal their idea, and the caribou, to create his own circus act and impress his lovely she-bear.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Jerry dreams of a life where he is the lord of the manor, and Tom is the servant.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Jerry is feeling lonely and wishes he had a girlfriend. Spike explains spring fever to Tom and they leave him be. Jerrys mood improves when he gets a message from his brawny cousin Muscles, who has fixed him up with his girlfriends friend for a double date.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: When Jerrys country cousins visit the Abbey, the cook is convinced Downton is in the midst of a vermin invasion! Cates (the butler) presses Tom into service with the threat of becoming a stable cat otherwise. Tom pursues the cunning, feisty bumpkins, and Jerry, throughout the manor, and they delight in making surprise appearances to Tom in awkward moments.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Jerry uses Toms fear of cucumbers to startle him at every turn.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Meathead has lost his marbles- really! Tom and Jerry visit the place where he last saw them, so he can compete in the marble championship.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Ginger loves that Little Quacker visits her new birdbath. Unfortunately, Tom and Spike try their hardest to get him to move out.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Bibi has some competition with Nightwings motorcycle, Nightbike. These stunt bikes will need to learn that theyre better when they work together. / After Nightbike reveals that hes afraid of loud noises, the Batwheels help him overcome his fear so he can stop The Penguin from strealing some valuable cargo.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Ducky and Quizz steal the Bat-Signals one-of-a-kind lightbulb, Bam and Batwing must find a way to restore the legendary light so Batman knows when Gotham needs him.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: When the ghost of a small towns founder returns to scare off mayoral candidates, the gang decides to run Velma as mayor to bait the ghost. They quickly discover, however, that Velma lacks the skillset to make her a popular politician!

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: The gang travels to Britain in 1843-ish and runs into Scrooge who claims he was attacked by the ghost of his partner Jacob Marley and that three more ghosts are coming. The gang agrees to solve the mystery but Velma wonders if she has more potential than just solving mysteries.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is at the supermarket when he spots a cool fire engine ride but the security guard makes it clear its for little kids only. Not to be deterred, Mr Bean tries everything he can to distract the guard to have his go on the ride. When he finally does get his go, its not as good as he thought it would be, especially when a real fire engine has to be called to help Mr Bean!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean embarks on plenty of adventures, along with his sidekick, Teddy. They try to stay out of the way of Mrs Wicket and her cat Scrapper, but often end up in trouble.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is at a farmers market with Irma at her knitwear stall right next to a man selling novelty teapots. Bean is instantly smitten with a green car-shaped one but cant afford it. When he visits a food truck thats laid out free samples, he hatches a plan to swipe them and sell them on his own stall so he can raise the cash for the teapot of his dreams!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is watching Clint Chiseljaw - his favourite action TV show - with Billy, but Mrs Wicket orders her nephew downstairs to finish his chores. Inspired by Clints catchphrase Nobody gets left behind, Mr Bean tries a variety of different daring plans to break Billy out of Mrs Wickets flat. But none of them work, until he hits on the perfect plan or so he thinks!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean peers through the window of the opening party of an art exhibition and sees free snacks being handed around yum! But hes told by the bouncer that he needs to be smartly dressed. So he sneaks into the artists studio and paints a tuxedo onto himself. This time hes let in, but will Beans fake painted suit last long enough for him to get his free food?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy cant believe his eyes when he sees objects moving all by themselves. When he realizes its the Lemmings who are playing around with a particularly powerful magnet, he has a stroke of genius. He will design a telekinesis trick to impress his beloved she-bear.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy is persuaded that the she-bear hes in love with has been turned into a frog. Whilst he looks through the rangers books of fairytales the Lemmings try to recover the frog.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy discovers a baby raccoon not far from the log cabin. When he sees its big, moist eyes, Grizzy melts and adopts the creature. When the Lemmings drag the baby into their dangerous games, the overprotective Grizzy steps in, provoking even more perilous situations!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: By pure chance, Grizzy discovers the pleasures of video games on the rangers console. The Lemmings want to try their hand at the joystick but Grizzy refuses to interrupt his Kart racing game. They try everything, including temptation, to get him away from the console but theres nothing doing, Grizzy is addicted.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy builds a look-alike robot to keep the Lemmings away while he prepares a party for his beloved she-bear. But his doubles artificial intelligence leaves a lot to be desired.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: When she is accidentally hit over the head, the she-bear Grizzys in love thinks shes a Lemming. Grizzy thinks that another little well-placed bang over the head will knock her ideas back into place. The only problem is that the Lemmings, who are delighted to have a new playmate, have no intention of letting him proceed with his plan.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: When a meteorite falls not far from the log cabin, strange berries start to grow. One of their properties is that they make anyone who eats them grow to disproportionate sizes.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Under the wood floor of the log cabin, Grizzy and the Lemmings discover the entrance to an underground gallery with an old treasure card that indicates the location of a treasure. Upon closer look, the representation of this treasure greatly resembles a giant jar of chocolate spread.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: When he brandishes a native american scepter that the Lemmings brought home with other antique objects, Grizzy sees the Lemmings bow low before him and behave like servants. One of them has escaped the spell, but he will have to confront both Grizzy and his fellow creatures in order to recover the scepter and reverse the spell.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Spike demonstrates for Tuffy what it takes to be a dog.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: The cat and mouse detectives pose as bellhops at a swanky hotel to catch a jewel thief.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tuffys wish to be as strong as Spike comes true.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Join Tom and Jerry in their new show while they fight for territory and dominance! This mischievous duo is up to new and hilarious shenanigans, will they finally be caught?

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: An old pair of Gingers tap shoes turns Tom into a tap dancing fanatic.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: When Tuffy shows an interest in soccer, Jerry decides to be the little guys coach and show him how the game is really played by beating Tom in a one-on-one match.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom is placed in charge of the preparations for the Duchesss surprise birthday party for her nephew, Rupert, and Jerry is determined to make a mess of it all.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: When Tyke is accidentally carried off to the local dump Spike is forced to enlist the help of Jerry and Tom to get his boy back before he is turned into a formidable junkyard pup.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: An over protected Spike goes to extreme lengths to keep his precious pup safe from harm.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is at the supermarket when he spots a cool fire engine ride but the security guard makes it clear its for little kids only. Not to be deterred, Mr Bean tries everything he can to distract the guard to have his go on the ride. When he finally does get his go, its not as good as he thought it would be, especially when a real fire engine has to be called to help Mr Bean!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean fears daft films about giant cats, blobs, and tiny dancing men. A trip to the cinema sends his imagination wild with hilarious, scary tricks.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean visits a safari park where he catches the attention of a baby monkey and unknowingly takes the monkey home in his Mini. After hearing on the news that the monkey has been "stolen", Bean attempts to return it without getting caught.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean fancies a game of golf so he creates his own golf course inside his flat and invites Irma to join him for a round. Their somewhat eccentric game takes them from sitting room to bathroom and through Mrs Wickets flat as they battle to be the winner of the First Bean Open Championship.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Everyone is ecstatic when Bibi, Batgirl, and Robin capture Toyman and his Do-Over remote - except for Bibi, who failed to stick the landing on a big jump. Unwilling to accept her failure, Bibi uses Toymans Do-Over remote until she perfects her jump!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Bam is sent to take on Prank, Redbird is forced to hang back because The Jokers van is too dangerous! When Bam discovers that Redbird secretly tagged along, hes upset... until Redbird bails him out of a tight spot.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: After Jestahs insults get the best of her, a short-tempered Bibi tries to not let the big-wheeled bullys words get to her so she can help Batgirl catch Harley.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Feeling neglected after being passed over on missions, Bam asks MOE to install experimental upgrades to curry Batmans favor. But, when Bams new powers are stronger than he can control, Batman and the mission are suddenly in danger!

programme.title: Tom And Jerry
programme.desc: One cats delicacy is another mouses poison. Tom and Jerry get caught in a thorny issue over the aroma of durian. Will the King of Fruits help reconcile their differences?

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Tweety leads the Looney Builders in building a new merry-go-round at the park for the kids. When his crane breaks down, his small size affects his ability to contribute to the build.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders learn that Taz accidentally destroyed his house, so they set out to build him a new one thats smash-proof.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings catch a grasshopper that can give you whatever your heart desires in abundance. All you need to do is set the grasshopper on its head while concentrating hard on what you want. As discretion is not the Lemmings strong point, Grizzy ends up understanding where their profusion of toys is coming from. Grizzy decides that its his turn to hunt down the grasshopper.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings are hungry! While fighting over a jar of Yummy chocolate spread, the jar is destroyed. But Grizzy discovers an ingenious manner to recover the remains of another Yummy jar using instant Chinese noodles as inspiration. The result is delicious. Grizzy and the Lemmings will once again fight over this new Yummy-based recipe: Choco-noodles.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: At nightfall, just as Grizzy starts to doze off, a racket comes from outside the cabin: the Lemmings are sliding along the Great Wall in a crate, propelled by firework rockets. Cleverly avoiding the bears strategies to stop them, the Lemmings accidentally set off a mechanism in a tower. A secret room filled with cannons and catapults opens, just waiting to be used by the powder monkey apprentices

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over the last jar of Yummy chocolate spread in the cabin and it ends up sinking in the lagoon. The bear makes a diving suit from various home facilities, while the Lemmings share a diving tank to put a wrench in their adversarys flippers! But the local wildlife comes to meet them.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy wakes up after a nap, starving, but the last jar of Yummy chocolate spread is empty. The cupboards are barren, except for a package of chocolate powder. Grizzy has the idea of mixing it with coconut milk. Its absolutely delicious! But the Lemmings, who are every bit as gluttonous, want their share of the choco-coco drink!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest rangers house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels its only natural that the rangers house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bears privilege"except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs latest invention generates identical versions of themselves and create a whole mob of Duplicate Specs and Skinnies to catch Lamput! However, the device becomes faulty, and the Duplicates cant be turned off. Now the Docs are stuck with annoying copies of themselves who are turning their lives upside down!

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: When Lamput disguises himself as a book and gets returned to the Library, the Docs have to be super quiet in their attempts to get him back. They finally manage to sneak past the Librarian, but all chaos erupts when they open a mysterious book in the restricted area. Lamput and the Docs have to team up to get the new ghostly resident back to where he belongs!

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Lamput cant stop reading and gets caught! Back at the lab, the story intrigues everyone who is brought on a captivating adventure featuring Lamput, Specs and Skinny in the leading role of a classic folktale. Robinput and his mates fight evil dictatorship for the perfect bedtime story.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean receives a delivery of a bunch of flowers for Mrs Wicket, but accidentally runs them over in the his car. He cant afford to replace them, so he decides to recreate the bunch by taking flowers one by one from anywhere he can - a vase in a cafe, a wedding bouquet, even from between the teeth of a tango dancer! But will he assemble the bunch and be back in time for Mrs Wicket?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: When Mr. Bean finds a fly in his room, its war. He needs weapons. Fly spray? A rolled-up magazine? These are only the start. In desperation, he enlists a mouldy doughnut, an encyclopaedia, an upside-down dustbin and a club-hammer. Finally, Bean becomes the first man in history to wage war on a fly... with a fridge.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket becomes annoyingly inconsolable when Scrapper goes missing -calling for him at all hours of the day and night. Bean cant get any sleep! He decides that the only way to restore peace in the household is to go out and find Scrapper himself -a journey that takes him deep into Londons sewers ...

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Bean discovers Mrs. Wickets nephew and Bruiser Jnr swapping football stickers and decides that he wants to fill up a sticker album too.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Fred lives out his childhood dream of being a stage magician as he and the gang go undercover at a private magic club being terrorized by a mutant Rabbit monster.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: The Gang travels back to Ancient Greece, where they play unique roles in a Greek mystery involving the mythological spider woman, Arachne, and her attempts to disrupt the royal wedding that would unite two great cities.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Spike demonstrates for Tuffy what it takes to be a dog.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: The cat and mouse detectives pose as bellhops at a swanky hotel to catch a jewel thief.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Join Tom and Jerry in their new show while they fight for territory and dominance! This mischievous duo is up to new and hilarious shenanigans, will they finally be caught?

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: An old pair of Gingers tap shoes turns Tom into a tap dancing fanatic.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: When Tuffy shows an interest in soccer, Jerry decides to be the little guys coach and show him how the game is really played by beating Tom in a one-on-one match.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom is placed in charge of the preparations for the Duchesss surprise birthday party for her nephew, Rupert, and Jerry is determined to make a mess of it all.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy gleefully discovers that he can print images taken with the rangers camera which is connected to a state-of-the-art printer. He decides to immortalize and frame himself

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Like usual, Grizzy picks the door of the Rangers log cabin to come in and make himself comfortable, but this time its impossible to enter! The Lemmings have requisitioned the cabin for a party and barricaded themselves inside. Grizzy has no intention of waiting for an invitation to find a way to get in.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have got their hands on a pack of white beans which have very strange properties: when mixed with soda, anyone who eats them turns into a bouncing ball.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings are having a blast with a bowling game they found in the Rangers storeroom. Grizzy hastens to destroy the pins to ensure his peace and quiet. But the Lemmings discover a remote-control device that can modify the balls weight. By setting it on maximum, the ball could knock over much more than pins: furniture, a bear and even a log cabin!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Near the supermarket a machine hands out surprise eggs in exchange for a coin. Amongst the lots to be won, there is a super firework rocket the Lemmings dream of, and a piece of costume jewelry that Grizzy imagines himself giving to his lady-love.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy finds a high-tech gadget that enables you to learn anything within seconds. He can now become the perfect bear!

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Moxie Manatee hires The Looney Builders to build an obstacle course for the Sandy Shells Preschool Games, but Lola isnt listening to her crew.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders build a party boat for Mac and Tosh when Tweety accidentally makes a mistake but doesnt ask for help.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders try to help Winston Whale by building him a mail truck, but Winston is used to working alone.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: When Mayor Foghorn Leghorn hires The Looney Builders to build a lighthouse for Looneyburg, Lolas tablet breaks and she must rely on herself.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders redesign the last hole of the ACME Acres miniature golf course. Porky is determined to make it just right for the children who will play on it.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Badcomputer captures Bibi and disguises Jestah to take her place with the Batwheels so that Jestah can steal the Batcomputers motherboard. / When a group of alley dogs, aided by a heroic stray, are saved from Catwoman by kind-hearted Buff, he brings them all back to live in the Batcave. / Batwing and Goldie secretly decide to participate in the Gotham Air-Show. / Bam brings Catwomans Catmobile to life so the Batwheels can have even teams for their game of "Bat-Ball".

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: After agreeing to swap motherboards and change bodies, the Batwheels have to quickly learn to drive a mile in each others wheels in time to stop the approaching Legion of Zoom!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Bibi has some competition with Nightwings motorcycle, Nightbike. These stunt bikes will need to learn that theyre better when they work together. / After Nightbike reveals that hes afraid of loud noises, the Batwheels help him overcome his fear so he can stop The Penguin from strealing some valuable cargo.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Ducky and Quizz steal the Bat-Signals one-of-a-kind lightbulb, Bam and Batwing must find a way to restore the legendary light so Batman knows when Gotham needs him.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Kitty is staying over at the Batcave for a sleepover, but getting her to lie down for a catnap is no easy task as the Batwheels have to find creative ways to get her to sleep.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Redbird learns a lesson in asking for permission when he takes one of Buffs stuffed animals without asking. When the stuffed animal accidentally gets swiped by the Legion of Zoom, Redbird will have to rescue the stuffed unicorn or admit to Buff what he did.

programme.title: Barneys World - Meet Barney
programme.desc: Vivie cant wait to show Barney her new picture -- just as soon as she can find the purple marker she needs to finish it! Barney encourages Vivie to clean up to find it, and Vivie learns that cleaning as you go can help you play!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Bean wants to avoid lunch with Irmas Mum at all costs. He persuades Mrs. Wicket to let him join her on a coach trip to a concert.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Bean is showing Irma his favourite tree in the park one day when he discovers a tree surgeon getting ready to cut it down. He darts up the tree and wont come back down. Irma loves this new side of Bean-ey! The tree surgeon is frustrated and tries various ploys to get Bean down. But can Bean make it to the toilet without being discovered and still save that tree?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket is persuaded by a jaunty estate agent to put her house up for sale. Bean is distraught -where will he live? Not Mrs. Wickets problem. Bean decides to hi-jack the sales process in order to deter all potential buyers -even if it means turning the whole house upside down!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean wants to learn skateboarding but hurts himself on his first try. Meanwhile, Miss Wince is showing off her new mobility scooter at Mrs. Wickets. Bean is entranced. He could do wicked ollies with that! He absconds with a souped-up scooter and heads straight to the skate park, ready to challenge Bruiser Senior and Junior ...

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket becomes annoyingly inconsolable when Scrapper goes missing -calling for him at all hours of the day and night. Bean cant get any sleep! He decides that the only way to restore peace in the household is to go out and find Scrapper himself -a journey that takes him deep into Londons sewers ...

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: When Mush-Mush and Chep lose Lilits flying disc down a snake tunnel, he is confident he can get it back. All animals love Chep and no-one knows more about snakes than he does. But this snake is not to be messed with! When they finally sneak into the snake tunnel, they learn why the snake has been acting so strangely...

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: All the Mushables have fun zooming down a long mudslide except Chep, who just cant get up the courage to do it. But when Fung and Miff tease him for being scared, he promises that he will do something that no Mushable has ever done before... ride a grasshopper! Chep is in for the ride of his life!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: When Lilit creates a "friends tree" mapping out who everyone is best friends with in Mushton, she realizes Muddler has no friends at all. Unable to accept this, Lilit slips away to try and befriend him. But Muddlers perception of friendship is somewhat unique, meaning Lilit now needs the help of her two best friends, Mush-Mush and Chep, to escape from Muddlers clutches.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Having rescued a Mushlet, Mush-Mush, Chep and Lilit becomes heroes in Mushton, and theyre loving it! So Mushlers create a rescue team - but, alas, no one needs saving! How can you be a hero when there is nothing to be heroic about?!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: The Beacon Mushroom that guides the Mushables back to Mushton in the dark has gone out. So Lilit lights up and stands in its place for the night... and soon gets quite bored! Lilits good deed has her regretting her gift - shes basically just a lamp! But when her light goes out, Lilit instantly regrets regretting it: she wants her gift back!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Every time Mush-Mush has tried to surprise his friend with a gift, Chep has always found out what it was. But Chep promises that this time he wont. And Lilit, who is too honest to keep a secret, promises she wont let Chep know what the surprise is. Both of them find this so hard! But Mush-Mush is one step ahead of them...

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings discover a top-secret Canadian Army prototype that allows you to pass through solid surfaces for a window of several seconds. How can Grizzy prevent the "infiltrating" Lemmings from stealing his jar of chocolate spread?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have found an Amerindian eagle amulet that endows he who wears it with the powers of a bird of prey. Grizzy would like to impress his beloved she-bear by soaring majestically through the sky. But to confiscate the magic totem from the Lemmings, who are now as sharp as eagles, Grizzy will have to use the cunning... of a puma.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings are having a blast with the rangers electric guitar and the cabin walls tremble with their experimental rock. Just as Grizzy is about to destroy the instrument, he realizes it can make harmonious sounds too. Will this be enough to seduce the she-bear hes in love with?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: To finally be on an equal footing with Grizzys imposing build and throw their own weight around in the cabin, the Lemmings decide to wear a blowup sumotori costume. Grizzy is roughly chucked out of the living room area. He decides to follow a special sumo diet to become the strongest guy around.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings discover an ancient Amerindian table with the power to show you past events. They relive their prehistoric ancestors first confrontations, and learn that chocolate spread was invented long, long ago.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings discover an old book of magic spells with a formula that enables one to take on the appearance of any other creature. The Lemmings have the bright idea of transforming one their kin into a double of the she-bear Grizzy is madly in love with in order to trick him. How could Grizzy refuse to give his jar of chocolate spread to his sweetheart?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: When Grizzy propels the Lemmings out of the log cabin perched on the Great Wall of China, the critters land on a small traditional house in a bamboo forest.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings love sesame nougat but Grizzy, who adores this treat too, steals their box. Quite upset, the rodents search for more, in vain. Instead, they discover the art of energy points in an old Chinese medicine book. Determined to recover their sweets regardless of the cost, the Lemmings activate Grizzys vital points and the bear finds himself completely blocked. Thanks to the book, Grizzy frees himself and learns to master energies in turn.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: After a game that ends abruptly, the Lemmings fall onto the roof of a temple where they discover drawings of Tai Chi movements. When carried out, the exercises generate a ball of energy! The Lemmings test out the sequence of movements on Grizzy, until he is evicted from the cabin and falls onto the temple in turn. His fall unveils a new sequence of movements on a fresco that could create an even stronger energy flow!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest rangers house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels its only natural that the rangers house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bears privilege"except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean and Teddy have no plans, so decide to stay in bed all day. Mr Bean is determined that his feet cant touch the ground, so he pushes the bed around with a broom. He has to find ingenious ways to make his tea and toast for breakfast, brush his teeth and an even bigger challenge of ordering a pizza and collecting it from downstairs without getting out of bed!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: After seeing the flashy electric go-kart Mr Paliwal has bought for his daughter Divya, Mr Bean and Billy build their own using items around Mrs Wickets garden. At the go-kart track, Mr Bean and Mr Paliwal are unimpressed with Billy and Divyas driving skills so take the karts for a proper race around the park. Meanwhile Mrs Wicket is on the warpath when she finds things missing from her house.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean embarks on plenty of adventures, along with his sidekick, Teddy. They try to stay out of the way of Mrs Wicket and her cat Scrapper, but often end up in trouble.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is at a farmers market with Irma at her knitwear stall right next to a man selling novelty teapots. Bean is instantly smitten with a green car-shaped one but cant afford it. When he visits a food truck thats laid out free samples, he hatches a plan to swipe them and sell them on his own stall so he can raise the cash for the teapot of his dreams!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is watching Clint Chiseljaw - his favourite action TV show - with Billy, but Mrs Wicket orders her nephew downstairs to finish his chores. Inspired by Clints catchphrase Nobody gets left behind, Mr Bean tries a variety of different daring plans to break Billy out of Mrs Wickets flat. But none of them work, until he hits on the perfect plan or so he thinks!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean peers through the window of the opening party of an art exhibition and sees free snacks being handed around yum! But hes told by the bouncer that he needs to be smartly dressed. So he sneaks into the artists studio and paints a tuxedo onto himself. This time hes let in, but will Beans fake painted suit last long enough for him to get his free food?

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: When Mushpie starts coaching Sumush to become fitter, faster, stronger, it unleashes a new Mushpie: one who demands excellence and full commitment! Poor Sumush!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: To Truff, making music comes effortlessly. So when he needs to put in a big effort to make a forest song, it affects him in unusual ways.

programme.title: Inside Africa
programme.desc: Rising dramatically from the plains of southern Malawi, Mount Mulanje is a soaring granite massif known as the "Island in the Sky." It is home to a fragile and unique ecosystem and at its heart stands the Mulanje cedar (Widdringtonia whytei), a tree so rare its found nowhere else on Earth. Once covering vast slopes of the mountain, the cedar is now critically endangered. Illegal logging, wildfires, and climate change have brought it to the brink, with only a handful of mature, seed-producing trees ever documented in recent years. Declared Malawis national tree, the cedar has become a symbol of both loss and resilience. We explore the bold and deeply collaborative effort to bring this species back from the edge. At the core of this movement are local Malawians, young men and women who grow thousands of cedar seedlings in grassroots nurseries, carry them in woven baskets to high- altitude planting sites, and spend days traversing rugged trails to restore whats been lost. Their work is physically demanding and often overlooked, but essential to the projects success.

programme.title: African Voices Changemakers
programme.desc: Larry Madowo sits down with Grammy-winning singer Tems in Lagos to trace her journey from bedroom producer to global icon. She opens up about her creative process, meteoric rise, and her mission to empower women through her Leading Vibe Initiative, offering an intimate look at an artist reshaping global music on her own terms.

programme.title: Showtime
programme.desc: Jennifer Lopez performed at Abu Dhabis Etihad Arena in July, one of dozens of events that take place here every year. Stars like her regularly steal the show. But we are shifting the spotlight to the men and women that bring these performances to life. We go behind the scenes at both the JLo concert and the Arenacross World Championship, seeing firsthand how these shows make it on stage.

programme.title: Marketplace Asia
programme.desc: Marketplace Asia covers the macro business trends impacting the region.

programme.title: Marketplace Middle East
programme.desc: The Middle East is undergoing a healthcare revolution, with cutting-edge medical technology, increased investment, and world-class facilities transforming the sector. At the forefront of this change is Sir Magdi Yacoub, the renowned British-Egyptian heart surgeon whose groundbreaking work has saved countless lives. Now, hes bringing his expertise home with the launch of a state-of-the-art hospital in Cairo, set to become a regional center of excellence in cardiac care and research. We explore Yacoubs legacy his vision for the future of healthcare in the region. Also: in this Abu Dhabi operation theatre room, the lead surgeon, Dr. Usman Ahmad, has multiple robot arms as he conducts surgery. As the first hospital in the Gulf to successfully perform robotic lung transplants, Cleveland Clinic Abu Dhabi is at the forefront of the region, presenting a strong case for utilizing robotics in the treatment of complex thoracic conditions. We explore the importance of robotic-assisted surgery for high-risk patients and how this will transform transplant care in the wider region.

Illegal logging, wildfires, and climate change have brought it to the brink, with only a handful of mature, seed-producing trees ever documented in recent years. Declared Malawis national tree, the cedar has become a symbol of both loss and resilience. We explore the bold and deeply collaborative effort to bring this species back from the edge. At the core of this movement are local Malawians, young men and women who grow thousands of cedar seedlings in grassroots nurseries, carry them in woven baskets to high- altitude planting sites, and spend days traversing rugged trails to restore whats been lost. Their work is physically demanding and often overlooked, but essential to the projects success.

programme.title: Marketplace Middle East
programme.desc: The Middle East is undergoing a healthcare revolution, with cutting-edge medical technology, increased investment, and world-class facilities transforming the sector. At the forefront of this change is Sir Magdi Yacoub, the renowned British-Egyptian heart surgeon whose groundbreaking work has saved countless lives. Now, hes bringing his expertise home with the launch of a state-of-the-art hospital in Cairo, set to become a regional center of excellence in cardiac care and research. We explore Yacoubs legacy his vision for the future of healthcare in the region. Also: in this Abu Dhabi operation theatre room, the lead surgeon, Dr. Usman Ahmad, has multiple robot arms as he conducts surgery. As the first hospital in the Gulf to successfully perform robotic lung transplants, Cleveland Clinic Abu Dhabi is at the forefront of the region, presenting a strong case for utilizing robotics in the treatment of complex thoracic conditions. We explore the importance of robotic-assisted surgery for high-risk patients and how this will transform transplant care in the wider region.

programme.desc: Mike Harris has come across fragments of a prehistoric herbivore. The dinosaur skull appears to belong to a duck-billed dinosaur a lucrative find that could earn the cowboy from Wyoming several thousand dollars. The pricing in the fossil business follows a simple principle: the more complete the skeleton, the higher the price! Meanwhile, Clayton Phipps is busy preparing the heavy rock package, along with Tyrannosaurus bones, for transport, and in South Dakota, Jared Hudson is excavating a Cretaceous turtle skull.

programme.title: Finias ja Ferb
programme.desc: Finias ja Ferb tahtovat ottaa kesaloman jokaisesta paivasta kaiken irti! Joka paiva he keksivat uusia jannittavia jekkuja ja heidan kateellinen isosiskonsa Candace yrittaa kannella pojista aidille. Kyseessa saattaa olla vuoristoradan rakentaminen takapihalle, surffaaminen esikaupungin hyokyaalloissa tai matkustaminen ajassa taaksepain. Perheen lemmikki, Nokkaelain Perry, elaa kaksoiselamaa salaisena agenttina ja on joka jaksossa napit vastakkain ilkean Tohtori Tollontyon kanssa.

programme.title: Finias ja Ferb
programme.desc: Candace vaihtaa paikkaa kaksoisolentonsa, Druselsteinin prinsessan, kanssa ja Finias ja Ferb rakentavat jattilaisjukeboksin. Silla valin Perry yrittaa estaa Tollontyota pilaamasta kaupungin uuden oopperatalon avajaisia. / Vanhemmat ovat matkoilla ja Candace kutsuu pari kaveriaan kylaan, mutta pian illanvietosta kasvaa valtavat juhlat. Tollontyo yrittaa saada kerrostalon haviamaan voidakseen katsoa naapurin drive-in -teatterin elokuvia ilmaiseksi.

programme.title: Finias ja Ferb
programme.desc: Candace on vastuussa veljistaan silla aikaa kun vanhemmat ovat lomalla. Kun han kuulee, etta pojat aikovat matkustaa maailman ympari ja nauttia kesan pisimmasta paivasta, han lahtee harkitsematta heidan mukaansa. Bufordin, Baljeetin ja Isabellan kanssa kolmikko suuntaa Japaniin ja Ranskaan, jossa he oppivat uskomaan mahdottomiinkin asioihin. Buford lyo vetoa, etteivat Finias ja Ferb onnistu luomaan historian pisinta kesapaivaa vaikka han salaa pitaakin heille peukkuja. Tohtori Tollontyo kidnappaa majuri Sahkeisen, jonka oli tarkoitus luennoida Hyvisten konferenssissa. Tollontyon tytar Vanessa ei ensin ilahdu siita, etta isa ottaa tyoasioita mukaan lomalle, mutta lopuksi tytto huomaa, etta hanenkin sisallaan asuu pieni pahis.

programme.title: Finias ja Ferb
programme.desc: Tohtori Tollontyo paattaa ryhtya hyvaksi, samaan aikaan kun Norm muuttaa Finiaksen ja Ferbin vahingossa vauvoiksi. Mutta kun Tollontyo tajuaa, ettei hyvyys suju hanelta, han palaa jalleen pahaksi. / 1900-luvun alkupuolella seikkailijat Finias Ohio Flynn ja Ferb Rhode Island Flecther etsivat kadonnutta temppelia Etela-Amerikasta muinaisen amuletin kanssa. Salaisen ritarijarjeston jasen Perry auttaa heita tohtori Tollontyota ja valtavaa Maissikolossia vastaan.

programme.title: Finias ja Ferb
programme.desc: Tyohonsa tyytymaton kuriiri Paul vie paketteja ympari kaupunkia samaan aikaan kun Finias ja Ferb rakentavat radan, joka sisaltaa kaikki huvipuiston laitteet ja tohtori Tollontyo yrittaa tuhota kaupungintalon Mehunaattorillaan. Lopulta Paul pysayttaa Tollontyon juonet auttamalla Perrya. / Finias ja Ferb rakentavat painovoiman kumoavan laitteen trampoliinejaan varten. programme.title: Finias ja Ferb
programme.desc: iti tekee neulontakoetta internetissa ja kaikkien pitaa olla mahdollisimman hiljaa, joten Finias ja Ferb kehittavat ninja-asuja, jotka katkevat kayttajansa kaikilta paitsi toisilta ninjoilta. Silla valin Buford ryhtyy tohtori Tollontyon katyriksi, mutta kaipaa sisimmassaan omaa norttiaan.

programme.title: Viru. Vabaduse saatkond
programme.desc: Dokumentaalfilm uhe erakordse ehitise ajaloost. Viru hotell on midagi enamat kui lihtsalt hoone - see on monument ja ikoon. Hotelli sisemus peidab endas lugusid nendest, kes seda maja ehitasid ja kes on seal viibinud. Film vaatleb Viru hotelli fenomeni, poliitilist tahtsust ja margilist tahendust. Sna saavad Sofi Oksanen, Maimu Berg, Eva Lille, Kuno Plaan jt tuntud inimesed. Juttu tuleb paljudest Viru legendiga seotud tahkudest, muuhulgas ka poliitikast, prostitutsioonist, KGBst, arikatest ja muidugi varieteest. Naeme ohtralt pnevaid arhiivikaadreid, mis mjuvad kohati nostalgiliselt, aga ka koomiliselt. Intervjueeritavate lood on tais inimlikkust - need on pnevad, traagilised, naljakad ja absurdsed tagasivaated meie kigi uhisele ajaloole.

programme.title: Blue Lights
programme.desc: Pinged Mount Edenis uha kasvavad ja Stevie prkub valjakutsele minnes oma minevikuga. Annie tegeleb oma impulsiivse otsuse tagajargedega.

programme.title: ERR.ee uudised
programme.desc: ERR.ee uudised

programme.title: How Animals Talk To Each Other
programme.desc: Nii suured kui ka vaikesed loomad suhtlevad haale ja kehakeelega, millega hoiatatakse ohu eest, naidatakse ules hellust, petatakse jarglasi ning isegi levitatakse kuulujutte. Laheme reisile umber maailma ja uurime lahemalt, kuidas loomad uksteisega raagivad.

programme.title: Osooni lood
programme.desc: Laheme koos matkajuhi Liisi Peetsiga varakevadisse metsa, et nautida metsakumblust ja tunnetada sugavuti looduse kosutavat mju.

programme.title: Eesti lood
programme.desc: Armastus on toonud Tushari Indiast Eestisse elama. Nuud on Tushar otsustanud minna oma valjavalitu sugulaste juurde Vrumaale, et ppida, kuidas olla teline eesti mees. Filmi reissoorid, produtsendid ja monteerijad on Anna Hints ja Tushar Prakash, operaator Ants Tammik.

programme.title: Wikmani poisid
programme.desc: Magneesiumiplahvatuse jarellainetus ei vaibu - peaaegu samavrd plahvatuslikult tekkinud armukolmnurga (Jaak Sirkel - Virve Pukspuu - Richard Laasik) omavahelised suhted ja pinged hakkavad arenema ning tugevnema. Uued tuuled puhuvad ka Wikmani gumnaasiumis. Plahvatuse tttu oma uleliigsust tunnetanud usupetaja Tooderi asemele tuleb hoopis teistsuguse maailmavaate ja ellusuhtumisega magister Saul. Stsenaristid Hugo Ader, Andres Maimik, Anu Soolep ja Vilja Palm. Reissoor-lavastaja Vilja Palm, operaatorid Aarne Kraam ja Rein Lillmaa, kunstnik Tiiu bi, helilooja Sven Grunberg, toimetaja Hanneli Reili.

programme.title: Prillitoos
programme.desc: Ernst Kessleri ehitatud orel on Ameerika vanim pill, mis asub Alaskal. Kuidas eestlasest meistri too nii kaugele judis ja kus Eestis tema pill klab, seletab oreliprofessor Andres Uibo. Lia Virkus jagab retsepti, millega saab ara kasutada sugisesed unad. Reet kohtub ule mere Rootsist laulupeole tulnud lapseplvesbra Marega, kellest sai esimene vanematele valismaale tagasi antud laps. Saatejuht Reet Linna, kaasautor Aivi Parijgi.

programme.title: Hommik Anuga
programme.desc: Hea tuju ja mnus meeleolu. Ootamatud vaatenurgad ja lahedad nostalgialaksud! Saatejuht Anu Valba. Reissoor Rene Vilbre, produtsent Andres Arro.

programme.title: Muusikast Mihkel Rauaga
programme.desc: Sex, drugs and rocknroll ehk armunud fannid, meeletutes kogustes raha ja selle arutu pletamine on korraliku popiidoli kuvand. Aga kuidas pariselt on? Milline on meie popijumalate vaimne tasakaal ja tervis ning kas kuulsusele tuleb ka livu maksta? Mihkel Raua vestluskaaslasteks on Sandra Sillamaa, Tnis Magi, Jaagup Kreem, Rita Ratsepp, Liis Lemsalu, Anne Veski, Tanel Padar, Stig Rasta, Juri Pootsmann, EIK, Korea, Kohver, Boipepperoni, Aivar Sirelpuu, Raivo Sersant, Alar Kotkas, Hendrik Sal-Saller, Karl-Erik Taukar.

programme.title: Suust suhu. Muusikamang
programme.desc: Uues telemangus elustatakse rahvaparimus Eesti saravaimate artistide esituses! les astuvad Singer Vinger, Sander Molder ja Liisi Koikson ning Marten Kuningas ja Robert Linna.

programme.title: Karen Pirie
programme.desc: Karen jalitab oma uurijatega kahtlusaluseid Itaalias ja Maltal, kuid keegi on neist pidevalt paar sammu ees. Lpuks saabub siiski lpplahendus 40 aastat varjatud saladusele.

programme.title: Aja meistrid
programme.desc: Animatsiooni elementidega dokumentaalfilm 85-aastasest Elbert Tuganovist ja 80-aastasest Heino Parsist - kahest animaatorist-elukunstnikust, kes vaatamata muutlikele oludele teostasid end aja meistritena. Stsenarist ja reissoor Mait Laas. Eesti filmiajakirjanike uhing valis "Aja meistrid" 2008. aasta parimaks filmiks.

programme.title: Vera
programme.desc: Kui noor naine leitakse raudtee krvalt surnuna, selgub, et ta oli tussanud kiki oma lahedasi ja nende heasoovlikkust ara kasutanud. Et aga selle phjusi leida, tuleb Veral minna neiu enda lapseplve ja perekonda.

programme.title: Maahommik
programme.desc: "Maahommik" randab mooda Eestimaad ringi ja kohtub erinevate inimeste ja nende pnevate tegemistega. Teie ees rullub lahti maaelu varvipalett koos kikide oma varjunditega. Loomad, taimed, talud, tood ja musttuhat muud lugu ootab teid just "Maahommiku" saates. Saatejuht on Kerli Dello. Vastutav toimetaja Maili Metssalu, reissoorid Mikk Mae ja Mati Kark, produtsent Tiina-Mari Koljak.

programme.title: TeadusEST
programme.desc: Kuhu on teel meid umbritsev keskkond ja kelle mju on suurem kas meil kliimamuutustele vi kliimamuutustel meie elule? Kuidas naeme juba praegu muutuste mju oma kodustes metsades, niitudel ja jgedes? Eesti teadlased panevad kokku suurt pilti, mille nagemine on tulevikku vaatamise aluseks. TeadusEST kaib kaasas uuringute tegijatega, kelle tana kogutud keskkonnaandmed toovad suurimat kasu aastakumnete parast. Saatejuht-toimetaja Kristjan Pihl, toimetaja Kertu Loide, reissoor Liis Lindmaa, produtsent Anatoli Tafituk, tootja Ulm Production. Saade valmib koostoos Eesti Teadusagentuuriga.

programme.title: Aktuaalne kaamera
programme.desc: Alaliselt jarelvaadatav

programme.title: Ukraina stuudio
programme.desc: President Donalt Trump lubas kohtumisel Soome presidendi Alexander Stubbiga, et USA suurendab koos NATO-ga survet Ukrainas rahu saavutamiseks. Mida sellest avaldusest valja lugeda ja kuidas edeneb Tomahawk tiibrakettide Kiievile tarnimise saaga, mis Moskvale suurt peavalu valmistab, seda analuusib julgeolekuekspert Helga Kalm. Venemaa jatkab massiivset huterrorit Ukraina tsiviiltaristu pihta, havitades talve eel elektrijaamu ja muid tavaeluks hadavajalikke objekte. Ukrainlaste hakkamasaamist nendes tingimustes ja valmistumist pimedaks ja kulmaks, kirjeldab asja sealt lahetusest saabunud ERR-i ajakirjanik Anton Aleksejev. Saatejuht on Reimo Sildvee. Toimetaja Peep Kala, reissoor Rait Roland Veskemaa, produtsent Tiina-Mari Koljak.

programme.title: Klassikatahed
programme.desc: Klassikatahtede kolmandas saates saavad klassikahitid taiesti uue nao ja varske kla. Vistlejatel tuleb esitada tootlus maailmamuusika tuntud paladest. Viis jaab kull aratuntavaks, aga kik muu klab teistmoodi juurde on pimitud kaunistusi, vahetatud seadeid, lisatud varve ja tehnilisi vimkasid. Kuidas noored ulesandega hakkama saavad, hindavad dirigent, helilooja ja kogenud arraneerija Rasmus Puur, maailmaklassi jazzpianist Ameerikast Holger Marjamaa ning ooperigurmaan ja Klassikatahtede esimene saatejuht Marko Reikop. Saate autorid on Helen Valkna, Anu Valba ja Timo Steiner, saatejuht Johan Randvere ning reissoor Krista Luts. Konkurss Klassikatahed sunnib Eesti Televisiooni, Klassikaraadio, Eesti Kontserdi ja Kultuuripartnerlus SA koostoos.

programme.title: heotsapilet laande
programme.desc: Avatud Eesti Fondi 35. juubeliks valminud dokumentaalsaade toob vaatajani loo uhest silmapaistvast heategevusorganisatsioonist, mis mangis olulist rolli Eesti taasiseseisvumises ja on siiani oluline tugipunkt vabakonnale ning omaalgatusele. Fondi suur eesmark ja saavutus on aidata ning mtestada avatud uhiskonda Eestis. Dokumentaal naitab, kuidas uks organisatsioon suutis pakkuda nii materiaalset kui ka vaimset toetust Eestile kriitilisel ajal ja teeb seda siiani. Fond oli enamat kui lihtsalt rahaline toetaja see oli ideede ja vaartuste kandja, kes tanaseni uhendab ning seob erinevaid uhiskonnagruppe uhise eesmargi nimel. Saade tutvustab fondi ajalugu ja inimesi, kes selles kaasa loonud ning projekte ja initsiatiive, milleta Eesti avalikku ruumi enam ette ei kujutaks (e-riik, Koosmeeleauhind, Arvamusfestival jne). Toome vaatajani raakimata lood ning foto- ja videokaadrid, mis aitavad mista Eesti riigi arengulugu pisut teistsugusest vaatenurgast, kui seni harjunud oleme. Reissoor ja produtsent Tarvo Tammeoks, toimetaja Kristjan Pihl, tootja Tammeoks Media.

Berdi juures peol kohtab ta vana klasside Riinat, kellega suhtlemine tekitab terava vastasseisu Zaiidiga. Reissoor Mihkel Ulk. Tootja Allfilm O.

programme.title: Eesti lood
programme.desc: Aja puudutus viib uute kunstiavastuste kannule. Sajandite tolm puhitakse maalingult, mille olemasolust polnud kellelgi siiani aimu. Professori ja kunstiakadeemia dekaani Hilkka Hiiopi jalil asutakse lummavat aaret puhastama, uurima ning autorit otsima. Kige selle kaigus muutub aeg kaega katsutavaks, seigeldakse tudmatutel ja seni labi uurimata ajalooradadel. Reissoor Maria Uppin, operaator, varvimaaraja Robi Uppin, toimetaja Merle Karro-Kalberg, monteerija Maria Uppin, helilooja, helireissoor Robi Uppin, graafika Joosep Maripuu, produtsent Maria Uppin. Tootja Black Plastic Media Productions O.

programme.title: La Promesa
programme.desc: Markii ja Curro lahedus hairib Cruzi. Salvador on veendunud, et Mara armastab Lopet. Uued kohustused on Maurole rasked. Abel teeb Janale abieluettepaneku.

programme.title: Sunnuntailounas
programme.desc: Kogu pere laheb vaatama Jani monoetendust Suuria sjast ja Facebookist. Tauno lobiseb kogemata valja pikantseid seiku oma abielust. Severi saab prutava uudise.

programme.title: Sunnuntailounas
programme.desc: Kogu perekond laheb Jussi-galale, kus Jani otsustab parast Miss Soome saatuslikku viga ohjad enda katte vtta.

programme.title: Marika Vaarik. Radikaalne loobuja
programme.desc: Naitleja Marika Vaarik on oma viimased aastakumned manginud otsingulistes lavastustes. Tema enda snul on saarane teatrikeel vajalik selleks, et juda endast suuremate aratundmiste ja uldistusteni. Kige olulisemaks peab ta sellel teel truppi - kaasteelisi, kellega lavastustest lavastusse koos liikuda. Tema sunnipaevasaade ei keskendu Marika Vaariku eluloole, vaid tema kunstilistele phimtetele, mida aitavad avada Marika kolleegid ja temaga koostood teinud lavastajad. Reissoor Marianne Krver, toimetaja Eero Epner, operaatorid Jekaterina Abramova ja Marianne Krver, muusika Jakob Juhkam, tootja Klaasmeri O. Tana on Marika Vaarikul 63. sunnipaev. Palju nne!

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Mikei etutar Anne ja tema sbratar Louise tulevad nadalavahetuseks kulla ning tekitavad paksu pahandust, mis lpeb murgitusega. Lord Ashfordlyle saabub kulaline, vene vurst Nikolai, kes armastab veini ja laia elu, kuid on hadas podagraga. Vurst palkab ihukaitsjaks Vernoni ja maksab Vene rublades. Bellamy kavandab Ginale ilusat ullatust, kuid David keerab kik kihva.

programme.title: nne 13
programme.desc: Johannes ja Kristjan arutavad, mida uude aastasse kaasa vtta. Evald mtleb oma vanusele. Pille ei taha asjatult oodata. Sumbergid valmistuvad peoks. Evelin tutvustab Arele Allanit. Teet Kallase dokumentaaldraama, idee autor Astrid Reinla.

programme.title: Sunnuntailounas
programme.desc: Tauno on krvuni armunud Leenasse, keda kohtab sbra brantil, kuid lapsed kahtlevad tema motiivide ehtsuses. Eevi otsustab panna kirja oma lusikaloendi ehk viimaste soovide nimekirja. Taavi nuab meessoost sotsiaaltootajat. Jani on endiselt ebasoosingus ja ka Severi ideed kipuvad liiva jooksma.

programme.title: La Promesa

programme.title: Mullist valja
programme.desc: Avahooaja pingeline lpp viib meid tagasi Buchasse, kus ootamatu kohtumine salaparase naisega raputab osalisi. Anastassia ja Grigori seisavad silmitsi kusimusega, kas nad suudavad lahti lasta oma varasematest vaadetest, seega hus draamat.

programme.title: Osoon
programme.desc: 13. oktoobril oli 100. sunniaastapaev nukufilmide reissooril Heino Parsil, kes ti looduse enneolematul viisil nukufilmi. Tema filmid nagu "Operaator Kps seeneriigis" ja "Meemeistrite linn" on vitnud vaatajate sudemeid labi kumnendite. Uurime, milline oli tema panus nukufilmi ajalukku. lemiste jarve aares on Eesti uks suuremaid nahkhiirte sugisrande-eelseid koondumispaiku. Jalgime, kuidas teadlased nahkhiiri puuavad, et uurida nende tervisenaitajaid. Saate autorid on Kristo Elias ja Sander Loite, toimetaja Marit Valk, reissoor Keiti Valiste, produtsent Heiki Sepp.

programme.desc: Donald Trump on otsustanud kehtestada USA kaubanduspartneritele tollid. Selgub aga, et meetmed ei pruugi aidata neid, kelle kasuks need on meldud. Uurime, keda uued tollid USA-s kige enam mjutavad.

Viis jaab kull aratuntavaks, aga kik muu klab teistmoodi juurde on pimitud kaunistusi, vahetatud seadeid, lisatud varve ja tehnilisi vimkasid. Kuidas noored ulesandega hakkama saavad, hindavad dirigent, helilooja ja kogenud arraneerija Rasmus Puur, maailmaklassi jazzpianist Ameerikast Holger Marjamaa ning ooperigurmaan ja Klassikatahtede esimene saatejuht Marko Reikop. Saate autorid on Helen Valkna, Anu Valba ja Timo Steiner, saatejuht Johan Randvere ning reissoor Krista Luts. Konkurss Klassikatahed sunnib Eesti Televisiooni, Klassikaraadio, Eesti Kontserdi ja Kultuuripartnerlus SA koostoos.

programme.title: Ringvaade
programme.desc: "Ringvaade" toob vaatajate ette Eesti elu kirevaimad tegelased ja suurimad seiklused. Saatejuhid Grete Lbu ja Marko Reikop.

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Mikei etutar Anne ja tema sbratar Louise tulevad nadalavahetuseks kulla ning tekitavad paksu pahandust, mis lpeb murgitusega. Lord Ashfordlyle saabub kulaline, vene vurst Nikolai, kes armastab veini ja laia elu, kuid on hadas podagraga. Vurst palkab ihukaitsjaks Vernoni ja maksab Vene rublades. Bellamy kavandab Ginale ilusat ullatust, kuid David keerab kik kihva.

programme.title: Tuleb tuttav ette
programme.desc: 1967. aastal toimus Tallinnas esimene suur rahvusvaheline dassifestival. Sundmusel oli tohutu kaal Eesti ja lahiumbruse muusikaelule. ETV ahiivis on olemas ka dokumentaalne jaadvustus, mille kallal tootasid mitmed vttegrupid ja paljud tegijad. Autor ja saatejuht Reet Linna, reissoor Maire Radsin.

programme.title: ERR.ee uudised
programme.desc: ERR.ee uudised

programme.title: Kotikino esittaa: Evolution
programme.desc: Palkittujen ohjaaja Kornel Mundruczon ja kasikirjoittaja Kata Weberin neljannessa yhteisessa elokuvassa kaydaan lapi perheen historiaa kolmen sukupolven ajalta, surrealistisesta 2. maailmansodan muistosta nykypaivan Berliiniin. Isoaidin sanoinkuvaamaton tuska ja hapea tulevat nakyvaksi Mundruczon elokuvailmaisun ja Weberin henkilokohtaisen kasikirjoituksen kautta, ja vaikka trauman taakka painaa edelleen, perhe katsoo kohti toiveikkaampaa tulevaisuutta.

programme.title: Dinner: Impossible
programme.desc: Robert Irvine is in Albuquerque, NM, home of minor league baseball team the Albuquerque Isotopes. Its Healthcare Worker Appreciation Night at the stadium, and Robert is tasked with serving an elevated dinner to 250 deserving guests.

programme.title: Restaurant: Impossible
programme.desc: Robert is in Texas to help a restaurant thats on the verge of closing. The overcontrolling owner risks losing both his business and his family.

programme.title: Bizarre Foods: Delicious Destinations
programme.desc: From Brussels delicious Belgian chocolate to Naples famous pizza, Chef Andrew Zimmern explores the delectable and iconic foods that define a location.

programme.title: Bizarre Foods: Delicious Destinations
programme.desc: Andrew dives into the seafood masterworks of the Hamptons. From delectable surf and turf to buttery lobster rolls, clam chowder to smoked bluefish pate, the Hamptons dinner scene is sizzling.

programme.title: Bizarre Foods: Delicious Destinations
programme.desc: Andrew Zimmern travels the globe in search of the most iconic foods that define a location. He discovers the secrets and stories behind the legendary meals.

programme.title: Bizarre Foods: Delicious Destinations
programme.desc: Andrew Zimmern explores the treasures of Cape Cods coastal cuisine. From fried clams to fresh-caught cod, clambakes to cranberry bog ice cream, its the Massachusetts peninsulas culinary scene.

programme.title: 24 in 24: Last Chef Standing
programme.desc: Michael Symon and Esther Choi welcome 24 elite chefs into the arena where they will spend the next 24 hours cooking. The first three-hour shift tests their speed, and Jet Tila separates the leaders of the pack from the chefs on the brink of elimination.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Guy Fieri heads to Reno, Nevada, where he tastes a unique twist on the breakfast burrito. In Ottawa, Canada, a 400-year-old cod cake recipe is on the menu.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Guy Fieri heads out on a meat-centric trip. In Richmond, Virginia, he digs into oxtail tacos and in Burlington, Vermont, a lamb French dip is served up.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Guy Fieri sets out to try all kinds of BBQ meals. In Ottawa, Canada, he tastes rotisserie chicken and in Richmond, Virginia, a monster meat sandwich is on the menu.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Guy Fieri is jumping into some sweet and savory dishes. In Burlington, VT, a vegan joint is gettin crazy with a coconut-banana French toast, and a gas station-turned-restaurant in Logan, UT, is flipping grilled cheese inside-out.

programme.title: Chopped
programme.desc: In this fourth preliminary battle of the sous-chef tournament, the four competitors open the appetiser basket and find a special seafood item.

programme.title: Chopped
programme.desc: Four champions return on a mission to become a sous-chef for a series judge. A stinky fruit and a spicy ice cream feature in the dessert round.

programme.title: Outrageous Pumpkins
programme.desc: The remaining five are challenged to create their own superhero. Plus, they depict a scene of DCs Batman facing off against one of his iconic enemies.

programme.title: Halloween Baking Championship
programme.desc: Inspired by the labs umami-loving mummy, John Henson tasks the bakers with creating sweet mummy treats that feature umami ingredients. Then, its "bone appetit" for judges Carla Hall, Zac Young and Stephanie Boswell as the bakers craft skeletal desserts.

programme.title: Cake Boss
programme.desc: Buddy and the team make a giant cake to mark the release of a rescued sea turtle. Meanwhile, Grace delivers a cake on roller skates.

programme.title: Cake Boss
programme.desc: Buddy and the team build a giant hula dancer cake for his nieces sweet 16 party. Plus, a pet store owner wants a tiny cake fit for a hamster.

programme.title: Symons Dinners Cooking Out
programme.desc: Michael Symon honours his Greek roots as he grills up spanakopita and tahini-dipped summer vegetables. Liz complements dinner with an ouzo cocktail.

programme.title: Symons Dinners Cooking Out
programme.desc: Things get sizzling as Michael Symon grills a strip steak with a secret ingredient, combines tomatoes with orecchiette and samples a bourbon cocktail.

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ree Drummond recreates a Tex-Mex dish from a friends engagement party. She makes crispy cerveza battered fish and prickly pear margaritas.

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
